description: Set back on a quiet tree lined street, you’ll find the quaint 2545 Rampart Street. This 3 bedroom, 1 bath charmer is recently renovated and boasts a new kitchen, refinished hardwood floors, modern lighting and newer paint. Large, oversized windows and glass french doors fill every room of this house with light. Gleaming Neolith countertops and stainless steel appliances showcase the recently renovated kitchen, complete with a chef’s cooktop and stove, french door refrigerator and high-end dishwasher. The spacious sunlit primary bedroom is framed by lovely French doors that peek over the deck into the garden. There is a large native plant garden that is fenced for privacy and features citrus and pomegranate trees! Impressive raised planter boxes line the side of the house and another beautiful native plant garden can be found in the front yard. The long driveway and detached garage ensures parking for you and guests. Stroll to local shops and restaurants in the Diamond and Laurel.

Alluring Penthouse w/ICONIC SF Bay/GG Bridge Views! The ULTIMATE in condo living! An "EXTREMELY RARE" offering! This PENTHOUSE (Suite 701) is ONE OF A KIND! Top (7th) floor, all by itself, nobody above or to the sides, END UNIT in all directions! Come for the PRIVACY & stay for the VIEWS! This prestigious Rockridge location boasts multi bridge views to enjoy from the personal & relaxing balcony! In the heart of Upper Rockridge near 5 star restaurants, boutiques, gourmet markets, bakeries, etc. Enjoy a coffee or a cocktail as your eyes wander over the waterways, bridges, hills & city lights. The rear wall is 90% windows for your viewing pleasure. Near Claremont C.C., Rockridge BART, TransBay Bus, AC Transit & more! New paint, carpet, updated bathrooms & kitchen, recessed LED lighting, gas fireplace, etc. A MUST SHOW! Compare, we bet you will be BACK! Some photos are virtually staged.

Oakland / Piedmont border w/ DIRECT OPEN AIR ACCESS to this sheik mid mod condo. Almost 900 SF. Large 1 BR, 1 BA flat feels incredibly private. Fresh floors & refreshed kitchen / bath, along w/ all the elements you see & touch everyday, have been thoughtfully updated w/ designer look. New appliances, designer paint, light fixtures, countertops & tile backsplash, faucets, garbage disposal, Nest Thermostat, vanity cabinets, bathroom tile floor, carpet, dual pane windows, glass closet doors. Don’t miss the dining room adjacent to the kitchen and the wallpapered office alcove w/ storage & closet organizers! Every detail has been considered so you could move right in from day one. Perfect place for first-time homeowners looking to build equity or perhaps a local family who wants a nearby living arrangement for a relative. Rare 1 car garage w/ bonus storage locker, PLUS a 2nd tandem parking spot. Lovely shared garden & picnic/BBQ area shows pride of ownership. Don’t miss a RARE opportunity!

Bantam Weight Champion of the World! Well, of the 1 bedroom condo world. Excellent 20 unit boutique “The Montclair” building. Everything you could ask for: Large bedroom, walk-in closet, secure dedicated parking and storage locker, secure building, in-unit laundry, open kitchen with a+ quality Studio-Becker cabinets, gorgeous bathroom, wonderfully private deck spanning the bedroom and living room sliding doors. Take a dip in the refreshing pool or lounge around the pool deck. Montclair shops and services right out your front door. When commute becomes a thing again, easy access anywhere via Hwy 13/Hwy 24 or transbay bus. Perfectly efficient home for a professional who needs a regular Bay Area landing pad, for downsizer or first time homeowner. Come see! These high quality units are seldom available.

Contemporary & stylish, solar powered townhome features 3 bed, 3.5 bath, 1,644 sq. ft. of open living space & a highly desirable floorplan that provides privacy & flexibility for modern living. The stunning chefs kitchen showcases an expansive island with quartz counter tops, handsome cabinetry, Bertazzoni & Bosch stainless steel appliances. The grand living room on the second floor featuring an open patio, makes this home perfect for entertaining & relaxing. Spacious first floor guest suite offers a large walk in closet & direct access to a private backyard. The master & junior suites on the top floor are both spacious & bright featuring ultra-luxurious bathrooms with double sinks. Modern & convenient amenities include keyless entrance, Nest thermostat, double pane windows, central AC, recessed lighting, LG washer & dryer in-unit, & attached 1 car garage with pre-plumbing for electric vehicle chargers. Community amenities include bocce ball court, ping pong tables, & picnic areas.

Seller says Bring All Offers! Come see this unique 1906 Earthquake house in a historic Lake Merritt neighborhood. A quick stroll down the street gets you to Lake Merritt and the surrounding areas with many restaurants, shops and brings you in close proximity to downtown! This one bedroom with its period details, including wainscotting and coved ceilings, has received a full remodel. The house has newer perimeter foundation, Marvin double-paned windows, modern doors, skylight, mosaic bathroom with large shower, newly installed oak flooring, melamine kitchen and pantry cabinets. The private patio constructed out of maribu hardwood consists of a laundry/storage room with a new Energy Star washer, and lots of storage. BART is nearby. Great place for a person(s) tired of renting and looking for a low maintenance home to call their own. Many Custom Feature Throughout!

Sun-drenched 5945 Sherwood is the best of both worlds - a private sanctuary set minutes away from endless trails perfect for hiking/running/cycling, yet moments from Montclair Village amenities including restaurants, shops, cafes, and weekly farmer’s market. The home provides true indoor/outdoor living in both front and rear - the front garden features slate paths and terraced garden beds with 11 different kinds of fruit trees, and the rear features enormous room-sized decks which connect to nearly every room in the home, a chicken coop (with real egg laying chickens!), and 3 add'l types of fruit trees. Recently remodeled bathrooms, a remodeled kitchen, and refinished hardwood floors make this 1929 home feel much more 2021. Fabulous Lake Merritt and Bay views. Green improvements include owned solar panels, efficient windows and doors, and a 220v Tesla charger. Assigned to Thornhill Elementary based on location, though admission not guaranteed. 2 car detached carport for easy parking.

other_agents: BACH NGUYEN - JACK LONDON SQUARE REALTY
description: Still Available!! This 1-bedrm unit is Southwest facing with views of the Oakland/Alameda Estuary. Updated and Remodeled kitchen & bathroom, & built-in AC. The Sierra is a Luxurious & Sophisticated Condominium in the heart of the comforts of an urban vibe & lifestyle in the Oakland-Jack London Square neighborhood. Conveniently located near 880 Fwy, BART, Alameda/Oakland Ferry, B Shuttle, & AMTRAK. OAKInt'l Airport is just a quick drive south. Enjoy the scenic Oakland Estuary pathway, dining, shopping, Farmers Market, and services. A Southwest facing unit, with afternoon/evening natural lighting in a 9' high ceiling loft, hardwood flooring and open floor plan. Seller has updated and remodeled the kitchen, bathroom, and appliances. Garage Parking(1 spot assigned); HOA amenities: 24/7 Concierge; Pool; Sauna; Fitness Ctr; Billiard; Conference Rm+more... All information and images should be independently reviewed and verified for accuracy.

Italian Design Meets Live/Work Loft Thoughtful in every detail, this home is full of light and delight. You can use the entire 3 floors of space for your own, or rent the first floor (with a private entrance), and enjoy living on the upper floors. It's 2 bedroom, 2 baths, with 1,636 square feet of space. The soaring ceilings give room for your creativity, with electrical connections in the rafters for shop equipment. The high-design gourmet kitchen will entice you to forge fabulous, fun meals, then enjoy the custom home-theater experience, with 7.1 sound, projector and motorized screen. A private balcony off the kitchen is perfect for al fresco dining, or just enjoying an espresso. Remodeled with gleaming wood floors, updated bathrooms with porcelain-tile walls and Toto fixtures, this live/work loft condominium is ready for you to arrive.

Nice 10th Floor true Jr. 1 Bedroom, Partial Lake views, New carpet just installed in bedroom. Wood flooring in living area. Newly Painted and Ready for New Owners. Access to on site gym, pool , whirlpool, clubhouse, computer room, conference room. etc. On site security, complete control access building, parking included in your HOA below building, in unit laundry too. Walk to Lake Merritt, Jack London, Oakland Chinatown, BART, Lakeshore areas, downtown Oakland. Transparent Pricing to buyer can upgrade themselves.

2bed/1ba home in Maxwell Park. Large living room and dining room. Open floor plan. A lot of upgrades done in 2013 incl: kitchen, bath, electrical, roof & stucco work. Hardwood floor throughout. Washer/dryer inside. Large storage room in basement. 1 car garage & driveway. Beautiful front yard landscaped. Large flat backyard.

Bright & airy Adams Point top floor unit w/ chic contemporary updates! Built in 1966, Unit 305 has a Mid-Century Modern feel w/ large windows & stylish bathroom & kitchen. This home has an ideal floor plan w/ tons of light, 2bedrooms, 1bathroom,& plenty of closet space within a comfortable 862 sqft. Kitchen+dining room have been tastefully renovated w/ shaker style cabinetry, granite countertops, recessed lighting over bar, sputnik chandelier over dining, laminate flooring, and stainless steel fridge, range, microwave, & dishwasher. Bathroom has been updated with subway & floor tile, shaker style vanity cabinet, & a granite counter. Brand new carpet throughout. Unit has dedicated parking space and storage above it. Commuter's dream! Centrally located with proximity to 19th Street BART, local/trans-bay bus lines (P), casual carpool & 580 freeway. Shop for groceries at Whole Foods, get dinner at Oakland's best restaurants as Lake Merritt, Piedmont, Grand, & Lakeshore Aves all nearby!

Wonderful opportunity to own a duplex in Oaklands San Antonio neighborhood. The upstairs unit features 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms with an updated kitchen. Unit unit has a flex space that can be used as the living room OR 4th bedroom. The bottom unit features 2 bedrooms and 1 bath. Separately metered for gas and electric. The owner pays water and garbage. The spacious backyard features a nice canvas for your urban garden. Two spacious storage sheds just off the back deck. The property is in close proximity to Highland Hospital, San Antonio Park, schools, shops and just 17 blocks from Lake Merritt. Easy access to HWY 580.

Nestled among the oaks in Montclair, here’s a PHENOMENALLY remodeled home with ultimate indoor-outdoor living style.This sun-drenched open-plan house is impeccably updated with contemporary high-end details. It’s set back from the street w/ a private + expansive front deck/outdoor living room, for al-fresco dining + expansive lawn & patio out back. Only 5 min. from Montclair Village (home of best Burrito @Taqueria Las Compadres) ,schools, parks, trails+ more! Upper level: high ceilings, fireplace, primary suite, fabulous power room, gourmet kitchen with induction cooktop, 2nd sink with instant hot water, designer lighting and eat-in sitting room that opens to the front deck. Dining/great room flows to a back deck. Lower level: 3 BR, 2nd family room with wet bar(!), gorgeous modern bathroom, bonus space, built-in Bluetooth speaker system. LARGE 6,440-sq-ft lot w/ trees trees & Chicken coop. Large garage w/ EV charging. 3D tour: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=KSv6xZqvcpz&mls=1

Well-loved 1925 Mills Gardens Bungalow in need of a visionary to design a new home for the next decade. The footprint of this property has a tremendous amount of potential to allow your imagination to shine. Public records state 1 bath and 2 stories; however, the property has 2 full baths and multiple levels. Its present configuration also includes 4 bedrooms, a family room, a formal living room with a fireplace, a formal dining room, a breakfast nook, a walk-in attic, and a partial basement. There are also some new windows. Buyers and investors, bring your plans and tools in addition to your creative ideas! Convenient access to Mills College, I-580, public transportation, and bicycle lanes. All information and images should be independently reviewed and verified for accuracy.

Seller says Bring All Offers! Come see this unique 1906 Earthquake house in a historic Lake Merritt neighborhood. A quick stroll down the street gets you to Lake Merritt and the surrounding areas with many restaurants, shops and brings you in close proximity to downtown! This one bedroom with its period details, including wainscotting and coved ceilings, has received a full remodel. The house has newer perimeter foundation, Marvin double-paned windows, modern doors, skylight, mosaic bathroom with large shower, newly installed oak flooring, melamine kitchen and pantry cabinets. The private patio constructed out of maribu hardwood consists of a laundry/storage room with a new Energy Star washer, and lots of storage. BART is nearby. Great place for a person(s) tired of renting and looking for a low maintenance home to call their own. Many Custom Feature Throughout!

Montclair Beauty! This 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom home with interiors beautifully remodeled and stylishly appointed is nestled in the serene Oakland hills. The main level opens into the bright living room with a fireplace and adjacent dining room overlooking the deck to enjoy gorgeous views! The spacious kitchen with new stainless-steel appliances and abundant cabinetry connects to the deck allowing for indoor/outdoor living, perfect for dining al fresco and your zoom meetings. Downstairs, 1 bedroom is the ideal place to relax and unwind after a busy day. There is also an independent access through the side stairs to the lower bedroom & bonus room. Laundry hook ups in the storage room. Top rated schools, small town feeling and close proximity to parks. Convenient location within a short commute to downtown San Francisco and Oakland Airport.

Available permit: remove desk at rear of 1 story sfd: and 407 sf addition to create laundry room, master bedroom with full bathroom . New tankless water heater . Refinished hardwood floors. New metal fence in the front and left side with gate. Renew whole house gas line. Sewer lateral has been done. Upraise new electrical meter through the roof. New sub panel box inside the house at the hallway. Excellent commute location close to BART and Freeway 880/580.

A sunny, extensively updated, turnkey home waits for you. This three-bedroom / two-bath home comes complete with a true chef’s kitchen (including a massive 6-burner stove & pro stainless vent hood plus stainless appliances, gleaming hardwood floors, & designer paint. All you’ll need to do is unpack! There’s a large, private rear patio off the dining room, perfect for al fresco parties under the strings of light. Choose to read or entertain in either the front living room or the rear den, each with a fireplace. The yard is extensively landscaped, including culinary herbs, many mature fruit trees, & dynamic flowering succulents. A 2-car attached garage leaves plenty of room for storage. Just blocks away from Redwood Regional Park, as well as a grocery store, Peet’s coffee and dining options, you can head a little farther to the Degrees Plato Taproom in the Laurel neighborhood. Both Hwy. 13 and I-580 get you anywhere else you need, or the Line 54 bus to the BART station is 2 blocks away.

Welcome home to this charming bungalow in vibrant North Oakland! Here you’ll find distinctive details like picture rail trim, beautiful hardwood floors, curated finishes, massive BONUS SPACE in the full size basement and a dreamy backyard. The first thing you’ll notice when you step through the door is the abundance of natural light in the living room, dining room and kitchen. The updated eat-in kitchen opens to a deck, patio and yard below, making it easy for entertaining and outdoor dining. The home has an attached garage and a full size basement checking the boxes for bonus space and storage. One of the best features of this gem is the location! Within blocks of either direction you’ll find all the wonderful amenities of Temescal and San Pablo Ave. Centrally located for an easy future commute, don’t miss this opportunity!

Just a few blocks to the shops, restaurants, cafes and the Saturday Farmers Market is this classic Crocker Highlands Craftsman bathed in natural light and loaded with charming period details. Updated for contemporary living with an open floorplan and fine finishes, this home offers seamless indoor/outdoor flow. The public rooms all open to each other with the large chef's kitchen at the rear featuring counter seating, a 36” Dacor six-burner range, French door refrigerator & quartz counters. Newer French doors open to the fully landscaped backyard with built-in grill, level lawn, terraced gardens and spacious patio, great for outdoor entertaining, play and dining under the stars. The primary bedroom retreat has a soaring ceiling, walk-in closet and sliding doors to a private terrace overlooking the rear gardens. 3 additional bedrooms, 2 baths, an office and tons of storage await you. A perfect spot to live, work, Zoom and play.

Don't miss this stylish contemporary West Oakland 3 story condo; updated and move-in ready! The main floor features a half bath, beautifully updated kitchen w/ new quartz counters, tile backsplash, new gas range, stainless steel appliances & breakfast bar seating. Perfect for seamless entertaining, the kitchen opens to the dining space & living room with industrial chic wood and iron stairs leading to the third floor, high ceilings and bright windows. Upstairs, both bedrooms have their own en-suite bathrooms and new carpet throughout. The primary bedroom is bright & private with a generous sized bathroom. The guest bedroom is spacious and light filled, perfectly set up to work from home! Ample storage, 2 car attached garage with workspace, and in-unit laundry. Building high speed Webpass/ Monkeybrains enabled. Located in the desirable West Oakland community of Zephyr Gate, just mins to Bart, bus lines and easy freeway access. Low HOA.

New Listing. This charming Lincoln Heights Bugalow has been thoughtfully updated and offers an all level floor plan. The living room begins with a built-in bookcase with bench seating and seamlessly flows into the cozy formal dining room. Adjoined is an updated kitchen with stainless appliances to support the chef’s culinary dreams. A convenient laundry room is tucked away on the other side of the kitchen. The hall bathroom is ideally located between the common living spaces and the bedrooms. The main level is completed by two spacious and private bedrooms with views of the beautiful verdant backyard. The first bedroom is large with sundrenched corner windows. The second bedroom opens to a classic sunroom that is perfect for a home office. The backyard is an urban oasis offering multiple experiences including a patio for entertaining, level lawn area for play and a deck. Just minutes to shops, restaurants, parks and transportation.

Great for home owner or investor. Beautifully Victorian style Duplex home within geat location. HUGE flat backyard! Live in one and rent the other. Newer exterior paint. Front staircase has recently been repaired/rebuilt. Landscaped front and back yards w/ newer dual pane windows, refinished wood floors, high ceilings and good sized bedrooms. upper unit has own laundry room. The spacious back yard featuires mature fruit trees , greeneries and add'l storage . Close to school, park, and tranporation. Close to 880 Freeway.

Remarkable Glen Highlands sanctuary offering inspired transitional style architecture, modern updates, hillside views, and close proximity to Montclair Village, Rockridge, and Elmwood for the upmost of convenience. (Rockridge and BART are at your reach in a mere six minutes!) Two floors of easy living, with the main floor at street level. The updated kitchen features stylish stone countertops, top of the line Thermador appliances, and an island perfect for gathering and entertaining. Soaring, open beam ceilings in the adjoining great room provide a light and airy feel. And you can cozy up during cold nights next to one of the home's three fireplaces. The primary bedroom is situated on the main floor and has its own en suite bathroom. A second full bath and office (or bedroom, you choose) occupy this floor. Downstairs you'll find more common living areas, as well as two additional bedrooms and a kitchenette that can support a multitude of uses, including au pair or in-law suite.

Craftsman style bungalow in the heart of Temescal. Blocks to Bakesale Betty, Temescal Alley, farmer's market and Rockridge shops. Urban dwellers' ideal location. Light filled living room with fireplace, original pull down desk, formal dining room features wainscoting, boxed beam ceiling and built-ins. Spacious eat-in kitchen w/butcher block, quartz, newer appliances and original cabinetry. Desirable split level floor plan. Two bedrooms up. Additional room on main level with built-ins, perfect for home office. Large garage, room for workshop, tools, and car! Private landscaped level garden is perfect for play and entertaining. Minutes to all major transportation, top rated schools, parks and urban amenities.

Welcome to 133 Temescal Circle, a lovely and spacious 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome in Emery Bay Village. This home includes an updated kitchen, open living and dining area, in-unit laundry, fireplace, outside storage, and deeded carport parking spot. Close to Bay Street, shops, restaurants and parks. Transportation options include the free Emery-Go-Round shuttle to shops and BART, Amtrak, and access to Hwy 80 and 580. WalkScore® of 88 and BikeScore™ 95. Don’t miss out on this beautiful home!

Welcome to your new Home!! Must see spacious 2 bedroom 1 bath with fireplace! Backyard deck and storage shed! and plenty of space to entertain. New Paint, refurbished hardwood floors, very cool old school architectural design ready for your fresh modern interiors. 5 min to Laurel markets, 6 min to LakeShore downtown cafes and shops, 8 min walk to the delicious coffee and food at Orbit Coffee!

SPECTACULAR CONTEMORARY WITH AWESOME 180 DEGREE VIEWS OF SAN FRANCISCO BAY. THE MOMENT YOU WALK INSIDE YOU NOTICE WALLS OF GLASS, OPEN BEAM CEILINGS AND FINE CHEF'S KITCHEN WITH CEASARSTONE QUARTZ COUNTER TOPS. LUXURIOUS BATHROOMS WITH ITALIAN PORCELIN WALK IN SHOWER WITH BAY VIEWS AND SOAKING TUB. BUILT IN CABINETRY THROUGHOUT. AMENITIES INCLUDE FISHER+PAKEL STAINLESS STEEL DOUBLE DOOR REFRIG & STAINLESS STEEL DISHWASHER DRAWERS, FIVE BURNER GAS STOVE TOP. BEAUTIFUL REFURBISHED LIKE NEW DECK THAT SPANS THE LENGTH OF THE HOME.

Traditional urban charmer bursting with curb appeal landscaped flora of ornamentals, succulents, flowers, and fruit trees! Quiet street of elegant Victorian homes in a trending pedestrian and pet-friendly neighborhood rich with history, artists, and bike lanes. Located near the confluence of the 80/880/980 freeways, enjoy easy access to SF, Emeryville, Berkeley, and downtown Oakland. 10-minute walk to BART. Quick access to the new Bay Bridge Trail and epic views of Middle Harbor Park in the Port of Oakland. Creature comforts within this newly-painted abode include new water heater, new furnace, new bamboo floors in the bedrooms, new double-pane windows, new fiberglass entry doors, new LED motion sensor security lights, and new redwood fencing and gates. Kitchen features granite counters, travertine floors, cherry wood cabinets, and stainless steel appliances. Home includes front-loading washer and dryer. Hurry this one won't last long!

Perfectly set in the heart and soul of Jingletown. This sumptuously modern industrial chic loft-style condo is built around a landscaped courtyard & fountain with direct access to the Park Street Bridge estuary boardwalk. Soaring 16' ceilings in the main living space and finished concrete floors adds sophistication to this unique home. Desirable open concept living connecting living, dining and kitchen finely styled with modern sconces & pendant lighting. All situated perfectly for the discerning host or hostess. Unique rustic French doors open to a bedroom that's currently used as an office and offers a full bath w/ tub and washer/dryer in closet and has access to a private outdoor patio much needed now for safe entertaining, or to escape the stresses of the day. A large bedroom located upstairs over looks the downstairs living space, and has warm wood flooring, a full bath and a walk-in closet with custom closet system. This cool & artistic home is the one you've been waiting for.

Urban oasis in verdant park-like surroundings. This beautiful level-in Emeryville condo, in Emery Bay Village, is the perfect place to work from home and beyond! Updated kitchen with new quartz counter tops and open concept living room/dining area lead to a private patio. Two spacious bedrooms with lots of natural light and large closet space in both. In-unit laundry makes life even easier. One deeded parking space is right outside your door in a covered carport. With a Bike Score of 95 (biker’s paradise!), and a Walk Score of 88 this amazing property is close to Bay Street Mall, shopping, dining, parks, public transportation and more. Commute options include the free Emery-Go-Round with access to BART, Amtrak to the South Bay and 80/580 to the surrounding areas. Close to all yet feels like you are in a private enclave -- this is the perfect blend of privacy and convenience. All information and images should be independently reviewed and verified for accuracy.

New Listing.This home has been thoughtfully renovated throughout and now beams with a delightful contemporary vibe, with SF-Bay views from the living room. This home offers three bedrooms and three full baths. Its open floor plan lends itself to a seamless indoor-outdoor flow and buyers will be greeted with a tastefully designed chef’s kitchen equipped with Brand New SS Appliances, Quartz Counter Top & a Full Wall Backsplash. A beautiful master bedroom suite downstairs and an ensuite bedroom upstairs provides all the convenience needed in a modern home. The backyard has been reimagined to allow full use of the outdoor space. Equipped with a level lawn, a Mahogany deck and an area to explore future gardening makes this a welcoming space.This property has ben fully upgraded with Brand New Foundation, Electrical, Plumbing, HVAC & New Roof. All work done with Permit. This property presents a geographic advantage with it’s easy access to freeways, minutes from trails and other attractions

BEAUTIFUL HOME!! Two bedrooms, one bath. This is a well kept home close to transportation and shopping. It offers a nice size back yard with fruit trees and a dog run. This inside features hardwood floors and cozy fireplace. Too much to mention, come and see it it won't last long.

This tastefully updated Maxwell Park beauty has arrived. Nestled on a quaint street in one of the most highly-coveted neighborhoods in Oakland, #LiveWellinMaxwell has held on to its character while evolving to accommodate a modern lifestyle. Your newly renovated kitchen has durable porcelain tile floors installed in a herringbone pattern, new stainless steel appliances, two-tone cabinets, pantry and perfect placement of the Samsung W/D. Behind the barn door is a beautifully redone bathroom w/ a textured subway tile and Mediterranean-inspired flooring + accent wall. Coffee on your front patio, breakfast in the dining nook, lunch on the roomy deck and dinner in the formal dining room. Downstairs is an excellent bonus space for entertaining or hosting guests w/ separate entrance. The garage is perfect for your morning Peloton ride and doubles as a private WFH space with a view of the lush backyard. Don't worry, there's still room for 2 cars in the driveway. It's time to #LiveWellinMaxwell

Charming white picket fence home with curb appeal in one of the hottest neighborhoods in Oakland. Sun kissed home with bamboo hardwood floors and separate dining area and newer light fixtures. Recently renovated large eat-in kitchen with granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, tile floors with roomy bonus pantry area. Separate laundry closet with stackable washer/dryer to keep things tidy. Ample off-street parking with driveway for multiple vehicles. Large unfinished basement for expansion potential. Central location near Laurel shops, restaurants, Fruitvale restaurants and BART.

Beautiful 3 bedroom 2.5 bath Townhouse with unobstructed views! Lower level consists 2 car garage with interior access, 2 bedrooms 1 bath and a patio. Upper level features a spacious Living room with firplace and deck, Dining room, all with views from every room! Kitchen, Master bedroom with fireplace. Carpet and hardwood flooring. Come and view your new home! Sewer & Sidewalk compliant.

Opportunity Knocks. Spacious 2bd 1ba in Hot Location on quiet 61st Street near Bushrod Park! Property needs work/updates including Kitchen (Large with Nook), Bathroom, etc. but still has "Old World Charm" in Living and Dining Rooms with all the original wood work details including built-ins, light fixtures and hardwood floors. Downstairs features a large basement with Laundry and Attached Garage. Spacious, flat backyard. Many items have been done including New Sewer, New Breaker Panel, New Paint in/out. Sidewalk is certified. Comp roof age is unknown but not very old! This property is ready for your clients creative design touches to shine!!

Full floor flat in a two-unit Victorian building, fully renovated and converted to condos in 2015. Updated finishes in a home that's kept its Victorian bones! Open concept living/dining/kitchen. All new systems, roof, foundation, tankless water heater. Solar panels added in 2020. High ceilings with recessed lighting throughout, wonderful natural light, many energy saving features. Two en suite baths; the luxurious primary bath has a double vanity & walk-in shower. Hardwood floors throughout. Modern kitchen with quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. French doors lead to a big wooden deck with hills views. Includes a spacious finished attic measured at 400+ sf, great as an extra hang-out room and/or storage.

Charming craftsman flooded w/ natural light & countless modern updates! You are welcomed into a stunning living room w/ refinished hardwood floors, fireplace, crown molding & a wall of windows overlooking the sunny back deck. Walk through the dining room & into the bright white modern eat in kitchen w/ quartz counter top and subway tile backsplash. Off the kitchen are the laundry room & half bathroom & backyard access. There are two light filled bedrooms & a bathroom w/ dual vanity, tons of storage & fabulous new lighting. Aside from endless interior upgrades, fresh paint inside & out, new hardware & fixtures, LVP flooring & windows to just name a few; the home also has a newly landscaped backyard with lawn area, fruit trees & deck for relaxing/entertaining. Gated driveway along the side house for off street parking & leads to a detached garage perfect for storage, workshop or home office. Abundant curb appeal & great location in Cleveland Heights and close proximity to Lake Merritt.

Located in the heart of the vibrant Laurel neighborhood, this remodeled and light-filled two bedroom, one bath home is move-in ready! Enter through the redwood gate and into a lush, water-wise California cottage garden that brings abundant blossoms spring through summer, followed by loads of passionfruit and pineapple guava in the fall and winter. Enjoy it all from the welcoming front porch. The house features bamboo floors, a cozy fireplace in the living room, energy-efficient central heat, and an eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and Corian countertop. The attached garage has laundry and storage, all with a code-compliant sewer & recent seismic retrofit. Just a short distance to great local restaurants and taprooms. Sequoia Diner, Degrees Plato, Ghost Town Brewing, boutiques, organic grocers like Farmer Joe's and The Food Mill. Convenient access to highways 580 & 13 plus direct transbay bus service to Downtown Oakland and San Francisco.

Check out this unique opportunity to affordable home ownership in City of Oakland. Newly built with stated of art energy efficient GigaCrete construction method, this beautiful one story home boasts 1,170 sq ft with 3 bedrooms & 2 baths, features sunny porch, an inviting floor plan, light-filled throughout, vaulted ceiling in living room, recessed lighting, gleaming laminate flooring, dining area opens to the modern kitchen with large island, white shaker cabinets with self-enclosing doors, quartz counter top, subway tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, elegantly designed bath with double sink, mosaic shower tile, generous sized bedrooms, master suite leading to a private backyard, in-unit laundry, off street parking behind gated fence, and much more. Conveniently located, easy access to freeway, public transit, close to San Leandro border, short ride to Bart, less than 20 miles to San Francisco. A must see to appreciate!

Remarkable Remodeled Bungalow perfect for a family or first time buyer. Carrera Marble Kitchen with Carrera Island. Same counters in the remodeled bath. Formal Dining, Fireplace. Picket fence front yard. Huge Pavilion in rear yard complements large deck. Detached garage. Plenty of parking. Fantastic fenced storage yard behind the garage. This lot is all landscaped. Beautiful green lawns. spots for vegetable gardens. A very calm and romantic home. Award winning San Leandro Schools

Fresh and totally renovated (work completed in March '21) top-floor residence, set on two stories. Upstairs is an open floor plan including the kitchen, dining area, living room and half-bathroom, with a lovely fireplace and hardwood floors throughout. Downstairs are two large bedrooms (one with an en-suite bathroom), in-home laundry and ample storage space. This home has never-used appliances (installed in 2021), quartz kitchen countertops, fresh cabinetry, bathroom fixtures. Even the walls and ceilings were refinished. Downstairs are 2 more generous bedrooms, one with separate entrance & half bath; both with huge closets, laundry & ample storage. First time on the market in 30+ years. HURRY!

A sunny, extensively updated, turnkey home waits for you. This three-bedroom / two-bath home comes complete with a true chef’s kitchen (including a massive 6-burner stove & pro stainless vent hood plus stainless appliances, gleaming hardwood floors, & designer paint. description: Dubbed The New Albion house and located in an ideal Rockridge location, this elegant traditional ticks all the boxes. Ahead lies the beautifully updated kitchen with a circular flow to a large rear courtyard, gracious living room, fireplace, and formal dining room. Up the traditional staircase you find city views thru the original leaded glass windows. Large primary bedroom with views, on suite bathroom & walk in closet. Two additional large bedrooms and a remodeled bath share the upper floor with beautiful vistas from every space. Interior access to the 1 car garage and additional off-street parking, plus basement laundry center and even more storage. EZ to SF via BART or the freeway. Welcome home.

Do you want to live or work in the heart of Jack London Square? Why set boundaries by choosing just one when you can LIVE and WORK in this amazing first floor live/work unit at 288 Third. Love an artistic home with charm, character and history? Look no further. Your dream home is a perfect mix of farm-to-table and custom design. Formerly the Oakland Concord Missionary Baptist Church, it was transformed into a family home blessed by the family who had been there for generations. The sellers repaired, redesigned, and reinvented with many creative details. The big backyard became the perfect spot for growing their own veggies, gathering fresh eggs and enjoying meals on the back deck. The Mom is a teacher, artist and chef, the Dad a renowned artist specializing in furniture, sculpture and home accessories. He redesigned their newly acquired home, transforming this historical residence to a beautifully integrated 3-bedroom, 1.5 bath home with all built-ins designed and made by him with quality of materials, craftsmanship and rustic charm. Their one-of-a-kind urban farmhouse is now for sale as they take their amazing talents abroad to expand their individual practices.

A short distance to Equator Coffee, Starbucks, Whole Foods, and all the great restaurants downtown Oakland has to offer. Conveniently close to both Lake Merrit and 19th Street BART stations. Montecito Manors is a well maintained complex and consists of 28 units. https://www.199montecito107.com/

"Beautifully Updated Home In Oaklands Highly Desired Mills Garden Neighborhood!" 60k in Recent Upgrades. New Inside, Outside Paint, Updated Kitchen, Baths, Windows. Mediterranean Split-level Home Blends the Charm of the Homes Vintage Years w/ Tasteful Modern Upgrades. Beautifully Landscaped Pathway to Front Porch. Home Showcases a Bright & Open Floor Plan, w/ that Cozy Feel. Main Level Features Formal Living Room w/ Fireplace, Dining Room, Reading Nook. Remodeled Open Concept Kitchen, Main Bathroom & Guest Bedroom. The Upper Level Features the Master Bedroom, Second Bedroom & Second Bathroom. Lower Level has a Bonus/Game Room/Living Room, Renovated Laundry Room & Bonus Bathroom, which can be Repurposed for use like an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU). Newly Landscaped Backyard puts the Finishing Touch on this Gem, where Special Memories will be made. Close Proximity to the Laurel District, Mills College, SF Transbay Services and Plethora of Local Hiking Trails. This is one not to be missed!

Welcome home to this bright and sunny abode in the well desired Havenscourt neighborhood! Close to BART, shops, and more but situated quietly and quaintly. This bungalow needs a little TLC but has grand potential. Featuring 3 spacious bedrooms, bonus space, and a lovely dining/living room combo! The large backyard includes ton of possibilities holding a detached garage that one may think about converting! Don't miss out on this gem on 68th!

Feast your eyes on this adorable craftsman cottage bursting w/charm & personality both inside & out! This 1bed/1.5bath home lives large w/its thoughtfully designed living spaces, open & easy floorplan, seamless indoor/outdoor flow, & bonus detached office studio providing the perfect retreat to accommodate today’s work-from-home needs. Shrouded by a lush blanket of flowering vines & variety of fruit bearing vegetation, the gardens provide both privacy & a delicious bountiful harvest all year round. Check out the private hot tub/spa hideaway with outdoor shower for that staycation experience. A one-of-a-kind private oasis with its lovingly nurtured gardens and personality-filled interiors located on a quiet, tree-lined street in Oakland’s Rockridge neighborhood just steps from College Ave shops, restaurants & cafés, top-rated Peralta Elementary School, neighborhood parks, groceries & daily life conveniences. Commuting to SF is a breeze w/Rockridge BART, bus lines & fwys just blks away!

Great price for 3 bedroom home on a quiet street. Cozy living room with fireplace and hardwood floors. Spacious kitchen with eating area. Good size bedrooms. Property needs TLC with someone's special touch to make this home a real gem.

Sweet Craftsman Bungalow on tree-lined street flooded with natural light and remodeled to the studs! In highly sought out Maxwell Park. All NEW electrical, plumbing, HVAC with 3 separate controls, double French doors, double paned windows (bathroom windows are double hung), insulation, sheet rock, ALL NEW kitchen with Quartz, Farm sink, tile backsplash, European style hood, Shaker cabinets, All NEW Appliances include: LG Washer & Dryer, GE Gas Range-Dishwasher-Refrigerator! ALL New bathrooms with 3 stylish rainfall shower systems & hand held wands, soaking tub with unique shelf space & Swiss Madison chair height toilets with dual flush system, All (3) new fences in back & side yards, huge back redwood deck accessible from Principal bedroom and kitchen, renovated and finished detached garage with insulation, canned lighting, separate heater & electric panel could be used as home office, kids play area, guest room, hobby room, etc.

Bright and chic starter home in highly sought after Grand Lake District. Located just a few blocks from Trader Joe's, Grand Lake Theatre and Lake Merritt. Recent upgrades include bamboo living room flooring and engineered wood bedroom flooring, new fixtures, and new paint. Home features an inviting open concept floor plan with breakfast bar and LOTS of counter and cabinet space. Walkscore 87, Bikescore 77. Commuter's delight with easy freeway access and nearby A/C Transit stop on Santa Clara.

Welcome to 5421 Brookdale Ave, a classic California bungalow with a modern, artful twist. Bathed in light & updated throughout, this special home is located on a wonderful block in Maxwell Park. This 2-bedroom, 1 bath home has an open floor-plan & a comfortable indoor/outdoor flow. Both the kitchen & one bedroom open to the backyard oasis. Greet your neighbors from the front porch or enjoy gardening, play or relaxation in the enchanting edible backyard. Features include an updated kit w/ 5 burner gas range, extensive storage & quartz countertops, a formal din rm w/ original built-ins, a large living rm w/ a fireplace, a detached backyard studio, perfect as a home office or exercise rm, a glorious backyard w/ raised beds, fruit trees, drought tolerant landscaping, a patio, a spacious deck & a garden shed. Additional amenities include a newer foundation, updated electrical & many dual pane windows. Mills College & Maxwell Park are close by, as are Sequoia Diner, Communite' Table & more.

Mid-Century Modern with open floor plan on 2 levels on sun-filled lot (deck, hot tub gazebo, hill views). Garage under house, direct access to downstairs, AC! Front flowerbeds. Broad-plank wood floors, neutral color scheme, recessed & vintage styled lighting. Main floor: open flow from front door through living-dining-kitchen-patio doors to deck. Cut-stone fireplace w/ mantel. Walk-through kitchen: granite counters over dark wood cabinets, s/s sink, appliances. Flexible-use front bedroom, 2 bedrooms with sliding barndoor closets. Bath: granite, shower, 2 sinks/vanity. Stairs down to lower level: w/d alcove, full bath, family room w/ built-ins, storage, utilities, gym/shop, garage. Spacious entertaining backyard: hot tub gazebo, huge deck off kitchen with pergola, upslope terraces, hills views, mini-lawn, annuals. Easy commutes via 580 & 13. Minutes to Montclair shopping, dining, Fabulous Farmer’s Market & Hip Laurel/Dimond shopping and dining. Many parks, hikes, biking above & below 13

The amazing views of the Bay, Downtown San Francisco, and the Golden Gate bridge are just the silver lining of this fabulous Maxwell Park home. Inviting open concept design on the main level, with a wood burning fireplace, custom built-ins and an attractive newly renovated kitchen with farmhouse sink, quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. On the upper level you will find the master bedroom with en-suite, an additional full bathroom, two more well sized bedrooms, one of which also has patio access to the verdant , freshly landscaped, tiered back yard. The large deck takes advantage of the fabulous view making it a perfect spot for entertaining. And to top it all off this home has a three car garage giving you ample parking and the option of creating your own home gym or workshop! Ideal location near the shopping and dining of the Laurel District, close to regional parks, trails, 580/13, Fruitvale BART station.

Nestled on over 1/3 acre of park-like grounds replete with majestic redwoods and oaks is this custom Mid-Century in the sought-after Piedmont side of Montclair. Head out your front door where the shops, restaurants and Sunday Farmers Market at the Montclair Village are less than a mile away. The open living/dining great room has a brick fireplace and a picture window with a peek of the Bay. The eat-in kitchen is the hub of the house and features built-in bench seating and stainless appliances. The generous bedrooms and both full baths are all on the main level. Head downstairs to the large family room, ideal for your game table and movie nights, an office/zoom room, laundry, a workshop, half bath and interior access to the two-car garage. The expansive backyard is a highlight with its gazebo, trails for exploration and private patio for entertaining, outdoor dining and play. Close to public transit & freeway access. 5912 Wood Drive is waiting for you to create its next chapter. All inf

Completely remodeled, tastefully appointed, 3 bedroom, 2 bath single family home (plus permitted ADU) in the Maxwell Park neighborhood, with a private, fenced yard for hosting memorable BBQs, and family events. Situated near Mills college and the growing Diamond district. Fully permitted AUD with separate entry - bring in extra income, or, house a family member. Built in 1924, the architecture is rich with period details, archways and charm. Thorough remodel includes: new plumbing, new electrical, fully owned solar panels, wide plank flooring, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, new LED lighting and a newly opened floor plan for modern living. Laurel Elementary School, East Oakland Leadership Academy and Skyline High School. Visit this home and fall in love.
Beautiful fully remodeled and expanded from the new foundation to the roof.
Entered for comp purposes. Sold off-market.

The stunning views of both downtown Oakland and the SF skyline never get old from this 1920’s traditional tenant-occupied home in the convenient Millsmont neighborhood. Featuring 4 bedrooms and 2 baths, it's a fantastic candidate for a 1031 exchange! This single family home features sensibly laid out living space that opens to generous decks overlooking a greenbelt and evening twinkling lights in the distance. With proximity to the 580 freeway, Mills College, the Oakland Coliseum, and miles of hiking trails in the East Bay hills, this investment offers enduring appeal for both the renter and the savvy portfolio alike.

Check out this unique opportunity to affordable home ownership in City of Oakland. Newly built with stated of art energy efficient GigaCrete construction method, this beautiful one story home boasts 1,170 sq ft with 3 bedrooms & 2 baths, features sunny porch, an inviting floor plan, light-filled throughout, vaulted ceiling in living room, recessed lighting, gleaming laminate flooring, dining area opens to the modern kitchen with large island, white shaker cabinets with self-enclosing doors, quartz counter top, subway tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, elegantly designed bath with double sink, mosaic shower tile, generous sized bedrooms, master suite leading to a private backyard, in-unit laundry, off street parking behind gated fence, and much more. Conveniently located, easy access to freeway, public transit, close to San Leandro border, short ride to Bart, less than 20 miles to San Francisco. A must see to appreciate!

other_agents: David Juarez - Keller Williams San Francisco
description: Located in Oakland's Wentworth/Holland neighborhood, this income producing single family home with a large in-law apartment offers stable rents and steady cash flow. The main house offers 3BDs+Den, 1BA and an off-street parking spot. The lower unit has 3BDs+Den, 1BA. Both share a large, flat, sunny backyard. With opportunities for improvement and upside rent potential, this tenant occupied property is value priced to generate positive returns for a savvy investor. Located close to Fruitvale BART Station, International Blvd BRT and I580, tenants have easy access to downtown Oakland and the entire Bay Area. Fixer.

Welcome home to this mid-century modern 1960 home with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths located on an large lot. Located in the heart of the Montclair Hills. The living room features Oak wood random plank flooring and a floor to ceiling traditional brick fireplace. The kitchen is equipped with built-in appliances and lots of countertop and cabinet storage space. The kitchen cabinetry is cherry wood. The adjacent dining room is spacious with room to entertain and access to the large flat patio. The flooring in the kitchen and dining room is quality Amtico laminate. Hardwood floors throughout the home. The guest bath has a shower over tub, and the master bath has a big stall shower. Both bathrooms feature travertine tile. The home has a large patio accessible from sliding patio doors in the kitchen/dining areas and from the living room. The garden wraps around the entire property and includes many varietals of plants and flowers. Attached garage with interior access!

Welcome to 5421 Brookdale Ave, a classic California bungalow with a modern, artful twist. Bathed in light & updated throughout, this special home is located on a wonderful block in Maxwell Park. This 2-bedroom, 1 bath home has an open floor-plan & a comfortable indoor/outdoor flow. Both the kitchen & one bedroom open to the backyard oasis. Greet your neighbors from the front porch or enjoy gardening, play or relaxation in the enchanting edible backyard. Features include an updated kit w/ 5 burner gas range, extensive storage & quartz countertops, a formal din rm w/ original built-ins, a large living rm w/ a fireplace, a detached backyard studio, perfect as a home office or exercise rm, a glorious backyard w/ raised beds, fruit trees, drought tolerant landscaping, a patio, a spacious deck & a garden shed. Additional amenities include a newer foundation, updated electrical & many dual pane windows. Mills College & Maxwell Park are close by, as are Sequoia Diner, Communite' Table & more.

Light-filled, updated tri-level home in Montebello Terrace. Offering spectacular, mesmerizing views of the bay, GG bridge & SF skyline w/decks on every level. The main floor has gorgeous hdwd floors, a sunny living room w/gas burning fireplace, built-in cabinets + a built-in seating area, dining room w/sliding glass doors to deck. Tastefully remod. kitchen w/quartz countertop, tile floor & stainless-steel appliances. The lower level has a laundry room & 2 BRs -both opening to a huge deck w/a hot tub. One of the bedrooms is being used as a home office & has built-in shelves + a desk- perfect for den or zoom room! The upper level has a fab master suite w/dazzling bay view, vaulted ceiling, walk-in closet, hdwd flrs & beautiful multiple pane windows. Just minutes from Montclair Village, shopping & restaurants, Farmer Joe's Marketplace, Peet's Coffee. Close to Redwood Regional Park & trails + easy access to 13 & 580 freeways. Enjoy indoor/outdoor living at its best!

Overlooking the Sequoyah Heights community w/ stunning panoramic S.F. Bay views, this townhome is located in one of the most highly sought-after communities in Oakland, surrounded by hiking/biking trails, Sequoyah Golf Club, Chabot Regional & Knowland Park, The Equestrian Center & more! Nicely updated, this 3 beds, 2.5 baths townhome w/ 1,636 sq ft offers an open concept living style that is great for entertaining or relaxing while you soak in the serene location & sunset views. With street level entry, the main level features kitchen w/ breakfast bar, eat-in dining area, dining/living room area w/ gas burning fireplace, remodeled half bath, new vinyl flooring throughout, a rear yard patio, 2 car garage & laundry area. The upper-level features 3 bedrooms, 2 remodeled bathrooms, & a master bedroom ensuite w/ a vaulted ceiling that's engulfed in natural light & sweeping views. A well-maintained community clubhouse & heated pool is open year-round. A hidden gem & much to appreciate!

Recently spruced up unit ready for an owner occupant or new tenant, with front patio, formal entry, modern flooring and plenty of counter and cabinet space in the corner kitchen. Good flow of space with hallway separating bedrooms & bath from the large living room. An oversized laundry room could double as home office. Upper unit occupied by Section 8 tenant also with good flow of space, plus the front balcony and back staircase. Grassy area between the structures with potential for planing boxes & miniature trees. Detached back house has private, flat and highly usable back yard, with good amount of sun for vegetable beds. Each unit is separately metered for water, with occupants paying the water bill. Nicely situated compound with good income calling for the right vision. Charming & picturesque street with a mix of single family homes & smaller units in the heart of the vibrant Fruitvale district near BART, local eateries and shopping.

Bask in the glow of the sunset every evening! Nestled into the verdant hills of Redwood Heights, this dazzling modern coastal cottage puts on a show every night as the sun fades behind the Golden Gate Bridge into the Pacific. Striated colors, glowing clouds, and beaming rays cast light on the SF skyline and shimmering bay waters. Everything there is to love about our cities by the bay comes into clear view from both the expansive 387sf entertaining deck and the elevated backyard enclave. Surrounded by nature and twinkle lights, you’ll sink into tranquility from this hilled oasis with a delightful panorama of starry skies and city lights. Open concept living with wide plank white oak floors and modern design touches. 3BR, 2BA + an office with separate entrance. The back yard is magical - a true sanctuary of citrus and olive trees and expansive views with plenty of space to entertain. A large 2-car garage with high ceilings has endless possibilities, tons of storage and a wine cellar.

This 3bed/2bath Oak Knoll home is the perfect combination of indoor and outdoor living. With natural light flowing and views of the city, the living room has fireplace and engineered wood floors.The kitchen/dining combo has center island, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, new dishwasher, full sized pantry, plenty of cabinets, counter space and the coveted window over the sink. All bedrooms are on private floors with 2 bedrooms share a spacious full bathroom. The main bedroom is designed to be the ultimate living experience with a spacious bedroom that has city views, plenty of living space for bedroom furniture and lounge furniture, huge walk-in closet, spacious bathroom with jet tub, washer/dryer and access to back patio. Added features: 2 car garage, front patio, newer windows, tiered yard & huge shed for storage. Bonus feature includes a chair lift that extends from the street into the house making bringing in groceries or grandma a breeze.

An investment opportunity you won’t want to miss out on! Comprised of two units on a large level lot offering an ideal layout for Buyers looking to live in one unit & rent out the other. The single level floorplan is great for compound living w/extended families so you’ll never need to be too far away from your loved-ones! OR use your creativity to combine the units into a large 4bed/2bath single-family home! With new exterior/interior paint, each move-in ready unit features 2 beds/1 bath, newly refinished hardwood floors, new light fixtures, in-unit laundry, wood-burning fireplaces, parking in 2-car garage. The rear unit has a spacious deck off the kitchen & a large level backyard. Located in the desirable Fairview Park neighborhood just blks from College Ave, Elmwood, Claremont & Rockridge dining/shopping amenities. Top-rated Peralta Elementary school is just around the corner! Less than 1 mile to Rockridge & Ashby BART for easy commute to SF!

Fantastic opportunity for the first time home buyers. Ready to move in beautiful hardwood floors with new paint inside and out, nice lighting inside. Garage converted to an extra room, new carpet, new paint, done without permits. Private backyard for family gatherings. New roof, refrigerator and stove stays. Front yard has a rod iron fence. Priced right, won't last long. +++ VIRTUAL OPEN HOUSE SUN NOV 29 12:30 to 1:00 PM, go to FaceBook and enter @lynellbevels in the search box +++

Behind the wrought iron gate is your urban oasis, a 1897 Victorian is brimming with charm and thoughtful updates. Generously sized rooms, large windows and soaring ceilings lend a feeling of light and airy spaciousness. Formal living room with bay windows overlooks flowering trees. Douglas fir floors throughout, save tiled bathrooms. Primary bedroom features full bath with shower. Second bath has a clawfoot tub perfect for soaking cares away. On-demand water heater means no worries about running out of hot water. New deck overlooks the spacious backyard with apple, fig, and plum trees . Outdoors spaces allow for off-street parking, a spacious storage shed, and sunny gardens galore. Chef’s kitchen has stainless steel appliances (Wifi-enabled 5 burner gas range, 2021), stacked washer/dryer, and soft-close cabinetry with spacious quartz countertops (2021). Located in West Oakland, just a few blocks to downtown, uptown, freeways, BART, entertainment and dining.

Improved price! This 2 Bedroom Bungalow in Havenscourt features a long driveway with ample off-street parking, a spacious, fenced backyard with patio, large bedrooms and lots of natural light. Currently tenant occupied with $1800 monthly income.

Space galore in this updated and well laid out 4BD/3BA Laurel district home! Large living rooms with easy access to outdoor entertaining area. Newer wood floors and windows and higher ceiling with clerestory windows in the main rooms. When we return to Holiday gatherings, celebrate with room for everyone at a large dining table! Enjoy an updated kitchen and additional space for cabinets and prep work with the practical center island. There are 3 bedrooms on the main floor, all a generous size. The primary bedroom has a walk in closet and en-suite updated bathroom, the bedroom leads to its own patio. Downstairs is a hotel size suite, with a bedroom and updated bath perfect for guests or extended family. The previous seller had a door to the exterior in this room. For those needing storage the laundry room is huge. Parking is easy with a driveway leading to a two car garage and interior access. Enjoy proximity to the Laurel shopping district and easy freeway access.

Urban oasis in verdant park-like surroundings. This beautiful level-in Emeryville condo, in Emery Bay Village, is the perfect place to work from home and beyond! Updated kitchen with new quartz counter tops and open concept living room/dining area lead to a private patio. Two spacious bedrooms with lots of natural light and large closet space in both. In-unit laundry makes life even easier. One deeded parking space is right outside your door in a covered carport. With a Bike Score of 95 (biker’s paradise!), and a Walk Score of 88 this amazing property is close to Bay Street Mall, shopping, dining, parks, public transportation and more. Commute options include the free Emery-Go-Round with access to BART, Amtrak to the South Bay and 80/580 to the surrounding areas. Close to all yet feels like you are in a private enclave -- this is the perfect blend of privacy and convenience. All information and images should be independently reviewed and verified for accuracy.

Location, Location, Location!! Adorable Craftsman in Allendale. This light-filled home is well-located, with a beautiful landscaped yard. Recent upgrades include a tankless water heater, dual-pane windows, seismic upgrades and is sewer lateral compliant. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath home retains a perfect blend of original charm and modern convenience. There's also hardwood floors throughout, updated kitchen and bath and a cozy living room with a fireplace. This charming urban oasis is awaiting your enjoyment. Walk Score of 81! Close to Hwy 580, parks, restaurants and much more.

other_agents: PETER ASHBAUGH - eXp Realty of California
description: Stunning and spacious condo on the Oakland/Emeryville border! Features three bedrooms plus a loft, perfect for working from home. Delightful upgrades including custom lighting, radiant heat, and new carpet. The main level features a great room with 20+ foot ceilings, an upgraded chef’s kitchen, and laundry. This open layout is perfect for entertaining. A large bedroom with a walk-in closet and a gorgeous bath remodeled with designer finishes completes this level. The living area opens via an oversized sliding door to a private outdoor patio and deck, ideal for relaxing after a long day. The upper level includes a loft area overlooking the lower level and is an ideal flex space with neighborhood views. The second floor also includes two additional bedrooms and another remodeled full bath. An attached one-car garage is below the unit, and there is an additional driveway parking space. Part of a 4-unit HOA with low fees, and in a great location near shops, restaurants, and transit.

Delightful one bedroom unit has been nicely updated with newer kitchen, bath and carpeting. Perfect home for first time buyer or seniors with complete resort amenities. Complex has pool, tennis courts, bike storage (if space available), marina. Convenient to two BART stations, freeways, Amtrak and both San Francisco and Oakland airports. Level in unit includes one deeded parking spot and one deeded storage area. Walk to Farmers Market, movie theatre (when open again), lots of restaurants. Convenient to Chinatown. Lovely easy walk to Jack London Square. Located between Brooklyn Basin and Howard Terminal which is to be the potential site for the Oakland A's Stadium.

One look and you will notice the nice flow of all the rooms in the home. Substantial renovations with permit were made within the original footprint of this house. Too many upgrades to mention. See disclosure package information. May be a good candidate for an ADU per building approval process. One of the bedrooms may be a great remote office for the homeowner. Security cameras may or may not be activated during your visit. OFFERS DUE 2 PM ON 1/19/21.

Great for home owner or investor. Beautifully Victorian style Duplex home within geat location. HUGE flat backyard! Live in one and rent the other. Newer exterior paint. Front staircase has recently been repaired/rebuilt. Landscaped front and back yards w/ newer dual pane windows, refinished wood floors, high ceilings and good sized bedrooms. upper unit has own laundry room. The spacious back yard featuires mature fruit trees , greeneries and add'l storage . Close to school, park, and tranporation. Close to 880 Freeway.

Welcome to the Penthouse! This exceptional corner unit is flooded with natural light and has a wide, open-concept layout. The bedroom has soaring 18-foot ceilings and a usable loft space above the closet. A bonus room near the entrance could be used as a second bedroom or the ultimate home office, complete with gigabit Internet. The chic, remodeled kitchen boasts recently upgraded appliances including an induction range. Other unique features include in-unit laundry, A/C, and two garage parking spots. The Sierra is a modern condominium located just a few blocks from the waterfront and offers premium amenities – a staffed two-story lobby, outdoor heated pool and sauna, state-of-the-art gym, open air lounge, and a cozy billiards / media room. Enjoy an easy commute with close proximity to BART, ferry to SF, shuttle through downtown Oakland, plus an endless array of trendy cafes, eateries and wineries nearby. Elevate your lifestyle and make this penthouse your luxurious new home!

Rare opportunity to get into a condo that also offers a spacious yard in the heart of Bushrod on the Upper Telegraph border off Shattuck. Embracing it's mid-century heritage, the building has the appearance of a detached home. Through the charming entry gate a walkway to the front porch, w/2 steps, welcomes you into single-level living & offers beautiful hardwood flooring in the living room & both bedrooms, arched hallway entrance & even a pedestal sink & claw foot tub! Located in a residential neighborhood w/ conveniences to restaurants, parks & easy commute locations, the condo shares only one common wall with your neighbor & features an updated eat-in kitchen, recessed lighting, newer windows & bathroom updates. Gas range, refrigerator, full-sized washer & dryer in unit included. Plus there is a one-car detached garage! Have someone else looking to buy? Check out 610 61st Street which is also for sale.
