This famous Emeryville Warehouse live/work loft, designed by renowned architect David Baker, is located in the heart of Emeryville. This ground-level loft features an open floor plan with extra high ceilings and unique industrial beams with bamboo flooring throughout. The expansive walls of windows illuminate the living-dining area, as well as the custom steel and wood catwalk, adding design interest and storage space. The kitchen boasts maple cabinets with quartz countertops. Below the loft bedroom is a custom-designed roll-away guest bed that tucks neatly away. The mezzanine overlooks the rest of the loft, making it the perfect space for a cozy reading nook. A walk-in closet with Elfa shelving provides extra storage, with the washer and dryer conveniently tucked away. Only 2 blocks from AC Transit to San Francisco, free Emery-Go-Round to BART and minutes from Pixar, Bay Street, Emeryville Public Market, Powell Street Shopping Center, and only about 20-minutes to San Francisco.

Unique one bedroom loft at Pacific Cannery Lofts. Development was constructed in 2009. This two story unit is equipped with stainless steel appliances, in unit washer and dryer and patio. The lower level features an open concept living room/kitchen, half bath and exposed concrete pillars with access to the front patio area. Upper level features a spacious master suite and full bath with laundry in closet. Community amenities include dog washing station, bike storage, gated community and EV charging station for every parking space. Unit comes with one garage parking and plenty of street parking. Virtual tour link here: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=TkrbW9jLyo7&mls=1.

This freshly painted, sun-drenched, end unit in sought after Hiller Highlands awaits new owners. On the second story main level, the open floor plan boasts a living and dining room with soaring ceilings, blonde wood floors, a stone fireplace with a gas starter, and a sunny deck perfect for dining al fresco. The kitchen was refreshed with new stone counters with a subway tile backsplash and features a gas stove and breakfast bar. The master suite is a true escape with vaulted ceilings and a private bath. Downstairs, both of the generously sized bedrooms have plenty of closet space. The back patio is perfect for barbecues and gardening. An attached two-car garage with interior access provides ample parking and storage. Convenient to Rockridge and Elmwood shops, freeway access, and public transit. Information regarding membership to Highland Country Club Available.

Set back from the street w/ a deep front yard & surprisingly generous bkyd & patio, owned by the same family for 40 yrs. Expanded by the current owner to its existing size, a generous 5 bdrm, 2 bath home w/ 2 fireplaces, & many thoughtful touches. Formal entry opens to a generous living & dining room w/ barrel ceiling & handsome charcoal gas-insert fireplace & natural light floods through the radius front window. 3 bedrooms & a full bath downstairs & 2 bdrms & a bath upstairs, this home provides a flexible floor plan if you work from home or want a sizable home to stretch out in. Designer touches have been added throughout, such as front & back doors newly painted in Venezuelan Sea, solid oak hardwood was installed to the majority of the downstairs floor & updated kitchen. Cynthia will forever hold the memories of the many celebrations that she hosted, often in her backyard, including when Cynthia’s granddaughter ate so many oranges off the orange tree that her lips were chapped.

Nestled in the heart of the Sequoyah Hills, boasting privacy and tranquility is this 2 story, 4 bedroom 3 bath home with bright and modern interior. Enter in to spacious rumpus room with fireplace and access tastefully remodeled, bonus in law unit, with 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. Upstairs with open kitchen, oversized island, granite countertops, cherry wood cabinets and custom inlaid wall. Large living room with vaulted ceilings, fireplace, and access to the front porch spanning the length of the house. Bedrooms with treetop views; master suite with 2 walk-in closets, built in vanity, and en suite bathroom. Backyard perfect for gardening, entertaining and sporting activities with multi leveled areas; patio, gazebo, batting/golf cage and custom raised planter boxes. At the end of a cul-de-sac, surrounded by nature close to hiking and biking trails, and Sequoyah Golf Course.
Home in need of work
Gorgeous home with recent updates.

Situated in the heart of West Oakland. This charming duplex features 2 bedrooms 1 bath on the lower level, and 4 bedrooms and 1 bath on the upper level. Both units are vacant. The duplex has seismic upgrades, updated electrical, and tankless water heater. Walking distance to Pretty Lady Restaurant & Cafe, and minutes away from the BART station. Great investment or home w/flexible use.

Welcome to 9 Schooner Hill with one of the BEST views & backyards in Hiller Highlands! Spectacular, unobstructed views of the San Francisco & Oakland skylines to enjoy sparkling lights & breathtaking sunsets! End unit with 2 bedrooms, including a huge master suite with gas fireplace, PLUS a downstairs office/Zoom room, 2.5 baths, & LOTS of storage space. Elegant living room features high ceilings, crown molding, gas fireplace & opens to large balcony to enjoy the views! Gorgeous Armstrong wood flooring throughout. Kitchen completely remodeled in 2019 includes all new cabinets, crown molding, quartz counters, custom tile backsplash & new stainless steel appliances. Exceptional master suite has sitting area, fireplace, vaulted ceilings, large balcony, walk in closet & recently remodeled bath with quartz counters, dual sinks in addition to separate jetted spa tub & shower. Backyard with approximately 450 sq ft brick patio. Minutes to Rockridge and Elmwood shopping! Great commute location!

Nestled in Montclair, this gorgeous Spanish-influenced Mediterranean home awaits. Inside you'll find an expansive living room with large picture window framing the garden view, tile accented fireplace, study alcove and entry to the formal dining room. The kitchen, with ample cupboards, eat-in area, large pantry and access to the back patio opens to a large study or chef's pantry to one side and a hallway connecting to the downstairs bed and full bath to the other. Upstairs you'll find a large landing, two light-filled bedrooms, one with a lovely alcove and accented by exposed brick, another full bath and laundry. Lovingly selected Spanish, Mexican and Jerusalem tile is found throughout the home and beyond. The outdoor patios, courtyard, and spacious storage structure complement the home surrounded by mature landscaping, olive, pomegranate and lemon trees. Close to schools, library, Montclair Village, and Sunday farmer’s market, with easy access to public transit and the freeway.

A rare find on a special street featuring an impressive juxtaposition of vintage charm + modern convenience. This 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home is located in Oakland’s Bushrod neighborhood and easily allows you to enjoy all that Temescal has to offer. The fenced front yard leads to a cute front porch, spacious foyer, and living room featuring built-ins + a brick fireplace. The open floor plan continues into the dining area, through to the chef’s kitchen, all the way to French doors and enviable deck + backyard. The kitchen was fully remodeled with herringbone tile floors, quartz counters, wine fridge/coffee bar. All 3 bedrooms are roomy and both bathrooms have benefitted from recent upgrades. The easy flow of this home draws you to a deck that makes the space ideal for hosting get-togethers; indoors and out. The fenced backyard is a grassy oasis. Stepping stones lead the way to a garage with separate flex space and a sizable storage shed. Don’t miss this must-see home.

Charming and Bright Bungalow with front porch and inviting backyard. Enjoy the open grassy hill views and private back yard. Beautiful original features including hardwood floors, fireplace and arched doorways. Upgrades include air conditioning, updated bath with jetted tub and more. Storage shed and

Glorious and light filled 4 bd/2 bath 1910 Edwardian on a tree-lined street, just 2 blocks from Macarthur BART,a short walk to to Temescal & Piedmont Ave. shops & restaurants, Mosswood Park. “Very walkable” 86/96 “biker’s paradise” walk scores. Combining plentiful original architectural details with many modern upgrades, the home features fully remodeled bathrooms and a large, freshly updated kitchen with brand new stainless appliances, quartz, and much more. Spacious master bedroom w walk-in closet, fantastic light, and tree top views. Two more bedrooms upstairs, and a fourth down that could double as home office, zoom hideout, Yoga space, or? The front porch is perfect for morning coffee or evening cocktails, and the huge backyard features mature lemon and apricot, plentiful herbs and spring flowers; and the front yard has a beautiful and majestic winter-blooming tulip magnolia. Additional improvements include: full new foundation w French drains, new plumbing, electrical, more!

Immaculate new finishes! Steps from old Oakland’s vibrant retail and entertainment scene is 901 Jefferson, a beautifully appointed condominium community with 75 stylish residences, including lofts, one-, and two-bedroom homes. These sophisticated industrial residences feature curated amenities like a community co-working lounge, a secure parking garage, bicycle storage and a central courtyard with barbeque and conversational seating. Inside each home you’ll find quartz countertops, Bosch appliances, wide plank wood flooring and open floorplans with views of the city and local parks. Don’t miss this unique opportunity to own a modern home in a truly iconic neighborhood. 3% & 5% down loan programs available.

address: 5321 Miles Ave Unit Z, Oakland, CA 94618
description: 5321 Miles Ave Unit Z is a visionary, tranquil eco-modernist 2-story end unit, entered through a lush communal atrium+courtyard. Built in 1979, the project was designed by architects Lee Porter Butler & Williams Pearson as the 1st "multi-family housing project utilizing the thermal envelope concept.” Many bohemian 70's era modern design elements; exposed I-beams, thick plank wood siding, massive wood deck+balcony, panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows/sliding glass doors,& multiple skylights. Tastefully appointed w/ parquet wood floors, wool carpet on stairs, bamboo flooring upstairs, & artisan tiling in kitchen/bathrooms. Kitchen has a natural edge Redwood slab counter, wood cabinets, large pantry, deep steel basin, range oven, & fridge. Both bedrooms have verdant views & are ample size. Walk-in closets! Unique craft or zoom room off full bath. In-unit laundry rm! 1 car garage w/ storage/workbench. Incredible Rockridge location near Frog Park, BART,& College Ave! 89Walkscore/92Bikescore!

This is a "Must See" 1912 Classic Craftsman, single story gem bursting with old school charm with a flare of modern touches from top to bottom. This sophisticated remodeled bungalow is located 5 blocks from the MacArthur BART station with easy driving access to downtown San Francisco. This homestead has been completely restored with permits, no short cuts or expenses were spared with this renovation! Recent new foundation, roof, windows, electrical, plumbing, siding, insulation, concrete driveway, electric sliding gate, and landscaping. The spacious kitchen with eat-in is open and connected to the rear patio area. Natural light infuses the entire home, from the front porch and lovely living room with decorative fireplace, to its formal dining room and built-in cabinetry. There is a lovely connection to the back porch that overlooks the backyard/entertaining area where the afternoon sun pours in. Super convenient location; close to Temescal, Emeryville, and AC Transit.

Lovingly maintained North Oakland Craftsman in the Golden Gate district, retains all of the classic lines on the exterior, with an open and modern interior. Open flow & clean lines of the kitchen/living room illuminated w natural light. Gorgeous oak floors & gas fireplace. Kitchen has wonderful flow featuring butcher block island w stainless steel cabinets & appliances. Laundry room/additional office has a clear view of backyard. Master BD allows full light & view of backyard w privacy from the fir trees & sheds. Master BD storage is abundant w full wall of built in cabinets in addition to a closet. Bathroom features claw foot tub w overhead shower, tile flooring & pedestal sink. 2nd bedroom/office has a built-in Murphy bed & tons of shelving.. Large backyard w full cement perimeter, ramps & new turf lawn, virtually maintenance free. New roof & fencing. Zoned HBX-1. Poised for a lift or ADU. 2 car driveway w 1 car garage. 2 blocks to Emeryville, 6 blocks to Berkeley. 80, 580, 880 acces

An exceptional Downtown location, you’ll be in proximity to Preservation Park, BART, Uptown, Jack London, Old Town, highways, China Town and Oakland’s central business district. Welcome to this spacious living space with high ceilings and exclusive views to the Pardee Home Museum, one of California’s architectural and historical treasures. Enjoy the functional floor plan with bedrooms separated by the living area for added privacy. The open concept kitchen boasts plenty of cabinet storage. The ensuite bedroom features carpet flooring, a ceiling fan and a sizable walk-in closet. A convenient second bath offers a shower stall and laundry closet including a stackable washer and dryer. Landmark Place is a controlled access building and includes a courtyard, elevator, bike storage room, and underground parking with one car assigned space. Appliances are included.

LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION! Conveniently located property with great development/investment potential. Property has a studio and a bonus storage room, with a covered patio. Low maintenance front and backyards. Located in Oakland's Opportunity Zone. Multi Units may be possible. Must verify with City of Oakland. Steps away from the vibrant Fruitvale District and minutes away from the Fruitvale Bart Station, Lake Merritt, Jack London Square, China Town, Downtown, and Uptown . Nearby schools, eateries, food trucks, markets, churches, convenience stores, hospitals, downtown, and 580/880 freeways. Only 20 minutes away from San Francisco.

Welcome to this bright and beautiful contemporary condo in a lovely private setting! Features include high ceilings throughout and two-story configuration with cozy patio & yard areas. Spacious living/dining room with engineered hardwood floors opens to a gorgeous kitchen with new quartz countertops, large breakfast bar, new stainless steel appliances. Remodeled half bath on the first floor and 2 large bedrooms and a remodeled full bath on the second floor. Only 3 units in the complex, low HOA dues, gated & fenced with secure designated garage parking & storage area makes this a truly wonderful place to live. Great location, short walk to Ashby Bart, Farmer's market, Berkeley Bowl, cafes, and local eateries!

Recently spruced up unit ready for an owner occupant or new tenant, with front patio, formal entry, modern flooring and plenty of counter and cabinet space in the corner kitchen. Good flow of space with hallway separating bedrooms & bath from the large living room. An oversized laundry room could double as home office. Upper unit occupied by Section 8 tenant also with good flow of space, plus the front balcony and back staircase. Grassy area between the structures with potential for planing boxes & miniature trees. Detached back house has private, flat and highly usable back yard, with good amount of sun for vegetable beds. Each unit is separately metered for water, with occupants paying the water bill. Nicely situated compound with good income calling for the right vision. Charming & picturesque street with a mix of single family homes & smaller units in the heart of the vibrant Fruitvale district near BART, local eateries and shopping.

Great price for 3 bedroom home on a quiet street. Cozy living room with fireplace and hardwood floors. Spacious kitchen with eating area. Good size bedrooms. Property needs TLC with someone's special touch to make this home a real gem.

Resting on an expansive lot, tucked behind tall hedges, 4339 Harbord Drive is a sprawling 4+BD/3.5BA Tudor in the coveted Upper Rockridge neighborhood. In the romantic Tudor style, the home features a charming brick face adorned by climbing vines, peaked front and side gables, and traditional half-timbering in the rear. The spacious modern interior includes a gracious entry, formal living room spilling onto the expansive rotunda, formal dining room, updated kitchen with breakfast bar and breakfast nook, and 3 bedrooms on one level - one a gracious owner’s suite. The home also features a private home office and two family rooms - one with a home theater system - and a guest/au pair suite with separate entrance. The dramatic rotunda deck and private multi-level back garden provide a tranquil retreat after a hectic day. Beautifully situated, the home is moments from Rockridge BART, coveted schools, and the Claremont Country Club.

Remarkable Remodeled Bungalow perfect for a family or first time buyer. Carrera Marble Kitchen with Carrera Island. Same counters in the remodeled bath. Formal Dining, Fireplace. Picket fence front yard. Huge Pavilion in rear yard complements large deck. Detached garage. Plenty of parking. Fantastic fenced storage yard behind the garage. This lot is all landscaped. Beautiful green lawns. spots for vegetable gardens. A very calm and romantic home. Award winning San Leandro Schools

This sophisticated brown shingle has been beautifully updated with a fresh modern look. Lovely garden pathway welcome with you to a spacious front porch & gracious foyer featuring high ceilings and gorgeous paneling. The chic kitchen offers custom finishes throughout, 6 burner BlueStar range w/ double overs, SubZero refrigerator & breakfast area opening to deck...great indoor outdoor living! The light filled LR, w/ adjacent family room/office, has oversized windows & French doors opening to west facing deck. Elegant DR features grand bay windows. The upper level has 3BR/2BA including large primary bedroom suite w/ marble/tile bath & office with SF Bay views. Lower level features BR & family room w/ garden access. Located just blocks from schools, Mulberry's Market & transportation.

Exceptional 3 bed/2 bath home in a magical hillside setting located in the Oak Knoll neighborhood of Oakland. Stunning bay views will enchant you from the living room and bedrooms, and 86 steps will take you to the top of the yard for the most incredible views of the bay, plus direct gated access to the hiking trails in King Estates Open Space. Gorgeous updates include gourmet chef's kitchen with indoor/outdoor access, updated bathrooms with Carrera marble counters and tile, en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower + dual shower heads, attached 2-car garage with E/V hook up + interior access, drought-tolerant front garden + turf grass in back, dedicated electrical panel for future hot tub. Large patio with gate leading to garden beds and paved path to upper yard, where you will feel like you are on top of the world.
2+ bedroom fixer. Contractors prefered. Cash only. Needs lots of work. Will start showing 3/23 and 3/24 by appt.

Located in Oakland’s desirable Temescal neighborhood this well maintained duplex is walking distance to Rockridge shopping center and the coveted shops in the Temescal. This is a great opportunity for an owner-occupied income-producing duplex offering 2 identical units that each have Livingroom, family room, dining room, two bedrooms, one bathroom, washer and dryer in the unit and and eat-in kitchen providing more space than some small craftsman homes. The wide driveway leads to a two car garage and the huge backyard that yields plenty of space for gardening, relaxation and a possible ADU. Located in the back of the house is the easy access to the large basement with utilities and ample storage. So much to be desired for an owner occupant or landlord.

Beautifully and fully renovated Grass Valley mid-century modern rancher. As formerly seen on HGTV, 4706 Stacy offers an abundance of natural light, split living spaces, and an open, inviting floor plan. Main level offers formal living room w/fireplace, picture windows, wood floors, guest bath and access to the two-car garage and built-in laundry facilities. Serene master suite has spa-like bath & views of mature trees. Two additional spacious bedrooms share the hall bath! The lower level offers a spacious dining/kitchen/great room combo and updated chef's kitchen w/SS appliances, island and farm style sink. Both French doors & sliding glass doors lead to a rare, flat & well maintained yard with no immediate abutting back neighbors.Enjoy indoor/outdoor living spaces to entertain guests and enjoy living in a peaceful neighborhood. The coveted location is an oasis for active nature lovers, hikers, golfers, horseback & steps away from Anthony Chabot Regional Park & close to Knowland Park.
Great opportunity to build a dream home or build a great income producing property. Bring your vision and contractors. Sold As Is.
Entered for comp purposes. Sold off-market.

Wow! The opportunities are endless. Well maintained 2bd/2ba house with attention to detail. This gated property features secure, off street parking for 5-6 cars and automatic remote access. Extra large lot features level yards plus a deck. There is plenty of room for gardening plus a well built storage shed with 2 rooms, electricity and endless shelf space. A large updated kitchen features granite and all newer GE appliances. It opens to a laundry room with partial hill and city lights views. The front bedroom shares access to a Jack & Jill bath with dedicated heater, fan and dimmable lighting plus a jaccuzzi tub. The rear bedroom has a private bath, walk-in closet, second roomy closet plus dressing area. Recent int/ext paint and two new roofs.

other_agents: PETER ASHBAUGH - eXp Realty of California
description: Stunning and spacious condo on the Oakland/Emeryville border! Features three bedrooms plus a loft, perfect for working from home. Delightful upgrades including custom lighting, radiant heat, and new carpet. The main level features a great room with 20+ foot ceilings, an upgraded chef’s kitchen, and laundry. This open layout is perfect for entertaining. A large bedroom with a walk-in closet and a gorgeous bath remodeled with designer finishes completes this level. The living area opens via an oversized sliding door to a private outdoor patio and deck, ideal for relaxing after a long day. The upper level includes a loft area overlooking the lower level and is an ideal flex space with neighborhood views. The second floor also includes two additional bedrooms and another remodeled full bath. An attached one-car garage is below the unit, and there is an additional driveway parking space. Part of a 4-unit HOA with low fees, and in a great location near shops, restaurants, and transit.

1924 Tudor Revival with City & Lake Merritt views in easy-commute, low-turnover Haddon Hill. Strollable to Lake Merritt, Lakeshore/Grand shopping, movies, farmer’s market. High-ceilinged living room: hardwood floors, adjacent entertaining view terrace, arched view alcove (library, cocktail bar), gas fireplace. Light-filled dining room. Stairs up to view landing. Primary bedroom: WiC + dressing room with lavatory, perfect spot for ensuite bath. 2 bedrooms, big closets, 1 with window seat views. Full bath with tub. Remodeled kitchen: quartz counters, white cabinets, double Silgranit sink, s/s appliances including Bosch DW and Dacor range, pantry wall, prep island. Wood-top breakfast bar with picture window--sip your coffee viewing Lake Merritt! Stairs from kitchen to lower level: Bedroom/Family room, yoga/gym/office room. Laundry room/full bath, washer/dryer, clothes folding counter. Big workshop, storage, interior access garage. Backyard: deck, benches, pergolas, fruit trees, swings.

Welcome to this top floor gorgeous south-facing corner unit w/ lake and city views in the heart of the Grand Lake district! Spacious floor plan allows for incredible privacy and storage with its long hallway between the bedroom and main living space which has both a full closet & walk-in storage areas plus an additional walk-in closet in the bedroom. One of its many dazzling features is the commanding views of the Grand Lake area, the hills and the sunsets from the open and spacious balcony and windows. Whether you are enjoying a cozy evening by the fireplace with wine and the stars or cooking recently gathered farmer’s market faire in your updated kitchen the layout of #304 is perfect for entertaining or working from home. Nearby amenities include the Saturday farmer’s market, TraderJoe’s, tons of dining and shopping options and the historic Grand Lake movie theatre.

This 3bed/2bath Oak Knoll home is the perfect combination of indoor and outdoor living. With natural light flowing and views of the city, the living room has fireplace and engineered wood floors.The kitchen/dining combo has center island, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, new dishwasher, full sized pantry, plenty of cabinets, counter space and the coveted window over the sink. All bedrooms are on private floors with 2 bedrooms share a spacious full bathroom. The main bedroom is designed to be the ultimate living experience with a spacious bedroom that has city views, plenty of living space for bedroom furniture and lounge furniture, huge walk-in closet, spacious bathroom with jet tub, washer/dryer and access to back patio. Added features: 2 car garage, front patio, newer windows, tiered yard & huge shed for storage. Bonus feature includes a chair lift that extends from the street into the house making bringing in groceries or grandma a breeze.

Lot 114 - Our Plan 1 is one of our most popular floorplans. On the main floor you'll find an expansive open concept kitchen/dining living area, along with a covered deck bringing in an abundance of natural light. The kitchen comes equipped with a Bertazzoni appliance package and pantry for added storage. All Ice House residences are solar-powered and feature modern amenities and private, direct-access garages. The community is front and center to everything: whether you choose to travel on foot, by bike, AC Transit Express Bus or BART, getting to and from the places you want to be is as easy as stepping outside your door. *Model representation photos

Embraced by a mature oak forest, your new Sequoyah home is prone to tree-top serenades of wild birds. The spring sun shines bright as you take in the clean fresh air on your private back deck & contemplate a day well lived. The backdrop is simply gorgeous & the walls of glass from the interior invite nature indoors. Tucked in a cul-de-sac, the peace & quiet on Silverado court is savored by neighbors; it's like a secret no one wants to let out! All level, your mid-century rancher may be one for the long-term. Once one moves here, often it's for good as there's so much to offer like the hiking trails of Knowland park & the upcoming amenities of the Oak Knoll community nearby. Warm & inviting, one's first impression upon entry are the classic characteristic exposed beams in the living room with vaulted ceilings that speak to an era of exemplary architecture. Still offering plenty of opportunity for your own tastes to shine, here’s your palette to paint the life you’ve been yearning for.

TRANSPARENT PRICE - Beautiful move-in ready Craftsman home in the heart of Oakland. Seamlessly blending classic charm and modern updates, this spacious gem is flooded with natural light. Well-kept, original details throughout including wood paneling and built-ins, hardwood floors, tiered tray ceiling in the living room, modern light features, projector screen in the living room and so much more. The basement includes a laundry room and ample storage opportunities. Large garage in the backyard would make a great workshop, home gym, or potentially spacious and separate in-law unit (ADU)*. Quick and convenient access to Lake Merritt, Piedmont Avenue, Uptown Oakland, Whole Foods, Sprouts, Kaiser, and so much more. Don't miss your opportunity to be in the middle of it all with this warm and inviting home that must be seen to be properly appreciated. *Buyer to verify with city. Craftsman style bungalow in the heart of Temescal. Blocks to Bakesale Betty, Temescal Alley, farmer's market and Rockridge shops. Urban dwellers' ideal location. Light filled living room with fireplace, original pull down desk, formal dining room features wainscoting, boxed beam ceiling and built-ins. Spacious eat-in kitchen w/butcher block, quartz, newer appliances and original cabinetry. Desirable split level floor plan. Two bedrooms up. Additional room on main level with built-ins, perfect for home office. Large garage, room for workshop, tools, and car! Private landscaped level garden is perfect for play and entertaining. Minutes to all major transportation, top rated schools, parks and urban amenities.

Corner duplex with 2 bed 2 bathrooms! Separate Water, Gas & Electric meters, Owner pays garbage only! Sidewalk Compliance, Garages converted to bedroom, Huge gated parking area can accommodate up to 6 cars, Units are in good condition with updated kitchens, bathrooms, and windows, close location to freeways and amenities. Live in one and rent the other side, or great s investment property.

FULLY RENOVATED HOME!! Beginning from the amazing curb appeal, this home has a lot to offer and only gets better as you pass through the front door! It features HARDWOOD flooring, New Recessed Lighting, fresh paint and fully remodeled bathrooms. Also comes with a Brand New Kitchen with New Appliances and an Updated WET BAR and a BONUS ROOM. Outdoor Renovations include New Dual Pane Windows, New Garage Door, a beautiful deck to relax on for some fresh breeze, and an exquisite landscape both in the front and backyard! Close to the 880 and 580 freeways, eateries, shops & much more! Words do not do justice to this enchanting home! Stop by and see for yourself, you do not want to miss this gem! Call/text LA for questions (510) 680-9338

Unique one bedroom loft at Pacific Cannery Lofts. Development was constructed in 2009. This two story unit is equipped with stainless steel appliances, in unit washer and dryer and patio. The lower level features an open concept living room/kitchen, half bath and exposed concrete pillars with access to the front patio area. Upper level features a spacious master suite and full bath with laundry in closet. Community amenities include dog washing station, bike storage, gated community and EV charging station for every parking space. Unit comes with one garage parking and plenty of street parking. San Francisco Bay views! Gated and landscaped front and back yards. Brilliant upgrades in this fresh fabulous Oakland Hills Piedmont Pines home. Nestled against 500-acre parkland. 2,638+/-sf. 4 bds. 3.5 bth. Open light-filled floorplan. Hardwood floors, walls of windows, skylights. Living/dining rooms w/French doors to terrace. New chef’s kitchen w/quartz counters, shaker-style cabinets, Thermador stainless appliances. Master suite w/view, new bath w/radiant heat floor, oversized shower, Calacatta marble dual sink vanity. Private gated front yard w/garden beds, brick walkway to covered porch. Backyard redwood deck, built-in benches, terraced lawn plus garden level w/fruit trees and, garden bds. 2-car detached garage with Tesla and ClipperCreek charging stations. Wifi controlled irrigation, CCTV security alarm, solar panels. Close to Montclair Village and Highway 13.

address: 1134 Foothill Blvd Unit B, Oakland, CA 94606
description: Charming classic Victorian thoughtfully redesigned and transformed into four extraordinary condominiums located just minutes away from Lake Merritt. 1134 Foothill Blvd unit B offers 2 bedrooms, one bathroom, an open floor plan, large bay windows, & a sun filled open living & dining space. Chef's kitchen features expansive countertops, stainless steel appliances, and abundant cabinet space. Perfect for entertaining. Upgrades include: light oak floors, soaring 10+ft ceilings, custom molding, sleek fixtures, central heating, on site laundry, new electrical, plumbing, roof, foundation, windows, & paint. Enjoy the classic architecture with stunning period details combined with the convenience of modern design. Located near great neighborhood restaurants, shopping, farmers markets, Lake Merritt, transit, & Bart. Must See!! 3-d tour, Floor plans, photos, & video tour available at: https://www.foothillblvdcondos.com

Don't miss this stylish contemporary West Oakland 3 story condo; updated and move-in ready! The main floor features a half bath, beautifully updated kitchen w/ new quartz counters, tile backsplash, new gas range, stainless steel appliances & breakfast bar seating. Perfect for seamless entertaining, the kitchen opens to the dining space & living room with industrial chic wood and iron stairs leading to the third floor, high ceilings and bright windows. Upstairs, both bedrooms have their own en-suite bathrooms and new carpet throughout. The primary bedroom is bright & private with a generous sized bathroom. The guest bedroom is spacious and light filled, perfectly set up to work from home! Ample storage, 2 car attached garage with workspace, and in-unit laundry. Building high speed Webpass/ Monkeybrains enabled. Located in the desirable West Oakland community of Zephyr Gate, just mins to Bart, bus lines and easy freeway access. Low HOA.

A Victorian style home infused with a touch of modern living. With a freshly painted exterior and interior, along with updated landscaping, this home adds an air of understated elegance to the charming Havenscourt community. Lounge on the cozy porch before making your way inside this home’s warm and inviting interior where you’ll be greeted with a picturesque bay window pouring out natural light, a fireplace, and refinished hardwood floors. From the remodeled kitchen with stainless steal appliances and stunning granite countertops to the updated bathroom and neutral color palette, this home offers 1242 sq. ft of living space. With a bonus room that can be used as a home office, library, or den and an expansive crawl space nestled below the home’s structure. The spacious backyard presents plenty of room to garden, entertain and unwind! This commuter friendly gem is located just minutes away from the Coliseum BART station, the Bay Bridge, and all major freeways in the East Bay.

Wonderful open concept living space. 2 minutes bus ride to West Oakland Bart 7 Min Bart Ride to San Francisco! 2 minutes drive to Bay Bridge A central location perfect for anyone trying to cut commuting time. Open kitchen with modern cabinetry - Appliances include: refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, electric oven/range. Shower/tub combo in the bathroom - In-unit washer/dryer - 1-car parking in the gated garage - Gorgeous, tended courtyard with seating - Secure building with intercom/telephone entry system - Walking distance to great cafes & restaurants; Close to Target, Home Depot, and Safeway. Easy access to freeways, the Bay Bridge, Amtrac. Great shopping, dining & entertainment nearby @ Bay Street Mall, Ikea, & AMC Movie Theater.

Highly desirable location on the water with private boat dock. A majestic 3BR, 2.5BA Mediterranean sits at the end of the cul de sac on an 8,000 sqft lot. The stunning views of both downtown Oakland and the SF skyline never get old from this 1920’s traditional tenant-occupied home in the convenient Millsmont neighborhood. Featuring 4 bedrooms and 2 baths, it's a fantastic candidate for a 1031 exchange! This single family home features sensibly laid out living space that opens to generous decks overlooking a greenbelt and evening twinkling lights in the distance. With proximity to the 580 freeway, Mills College, the Oakland Coliseum, and miles of hiking trails in the East Bay hills, this investment offers enduring appeal for both the renter and the savvy portfolio alike.

Lower Maxwell Park's cozy and charming 3 Bed, 1 Bath home is MOVE-IN-READY! Newly remodeled kitchen & bathroom, freshly painted interior, new flooring, new interior doors, and large landscaped backyard is ready for you and your family to enjoy.

An elevated single family home full of grace, space and beauty. The backyard is an urban oasis offering multiple experiences including a patio for entertaining, level lawn area for play and a deck. Just minutes to shops, restaurants, parks and transportation.

Built in 1888 this West Oakland Folk Victorian still serves its purpose well, providing comfortable housing for the modern Oaklander. Its long, covered front porch and prominent gable create an inviting facade. Upstairs the 3BR/1.5BA home has sky-high ceilings, bulls-eye trim & picture rails — handsome details that remind you of its storied past. Bright living room with fun sputnik fixture and a large picture window. Cork flooring is warm & soft underfoot. The generous primary bedroom has a wonderful outlook onto the sunny yard - a private sanctuary to delight and inspire the urban gardener plus a shed with power to plug in for your zoom or unplug for yoga. The 2BR/1BA unit downstairs can help offset expenses or could be an awesome workshop or art studio. All this in the heart of coveted South Prescott - an enclave free of thru-traffic and full of a special mix of old-timers, artists, and friendly neighbors just 1 block to BART and a couple blocks to coffee & organic groceries! All inf

Lovely bright 2 bedroom classic Craftsman home with extra office space not on public record. Cozy front porch; newly refinished hardwood floors, wonderful wood details; living room w/fireplace; large dining area with cherry wood pass-through window to remodeled kitchen; updated bathroom; spacious landscaped/fenced backyard with deck, lemon tree and flower beds. Recently installed fully functioning outdoor kitchen makes al fresco entertaining a cinch; motorized secured gate leads to extra-long driveway for play. Detached garage (potential ADU), and unfinished basement offer tons of storage! Fantastic starter home! Friendly neighborhood and conveniently located near the Laurel district, freeways, and public transportation.

Sited on a quiet cul-de-sac in the Claremont Hills and offering unbelievable panoramic San Francisco Bay and Golden Gate Bridge views, 11 Drury Ln is a tranquil light filled home. Delightful easy floor plan, including open dining room and living room with soaring vaulted ceilings, chefs kitchen with granite countertops and Wolf appliances. Office/den on main level with built-ins. Three bedrooms and 3.5 baths including spacious primary bedroom with sliding glass doors to gardens. Third bedroom could be in-law unit, featuring it’s own living room and exterior access. Attached garage with interior access to main level. Au-pair space has it's own kitchenette! 11 Drury Lane is a peaceful retreat yet just minutes from College Ave, BART and UC Berkeley campus. A must see! City of Oakland, Berkeley mailing ONLY.

Price Reduction for fast sale! Great views and tons of potential to build your dream home in the Oakland Hills. Lowest priced fixer upper to build or expand and create immediate equity. Corner lot with amazing views and easy access to the bay. 2 beds 1 bath fixer upper with potential! Perfect for Investors or first time home buyers. This home is in need of some TLC, is a great opportunity for interested buyers to renovate it with their unique style. Room to expand the existing property and/or build again!

Remarkable Glen Highlands sanctuary offering inspired transitional style architecture, modern updates, hillside views, and close proximity to Montclair Village, Rockridge, and Elmwood for the upmost of convenience. (Rockridge and BART are at your reach in a mere six minutes!) Two floors of easy living, with the main floor at street level. The updated kitchen features stylish stone countertops, top of the line Thermador appliances, and an island perfect for gathering and entertaining. Soaring, open beam ceilings in the adjoining great room provide a light and airy feel. And you can cozy up during cold nights next to one of the home's three fireplaces. The primary bedroom is situated on the main floor and has its own en suite bathroom. A second full bath and office (or bedroom, you choose) occupy this floor. Downstairs you'll find more common living areas, as well as two additional bedrooms and a kitchenette that can support a multitude of uses, including au pair or in-law suite.

Spectacularly renovated Crocker Highlands contemporary offering serene neighborhood vistas. Positioned just off Trestle Glen Rd., the home features vaulted ceilings, abundant natural light, and superb separation of space.

Stylish, modern condo at Pacific Cannery Lofts, a David Baker + Partners designed development in the heart of West Oakland. This ground floor unit offers open concept living with high ceilings, large windows, new flooring throughout and in-unit laundry. Easy access and outdoor space makes this home great for life during a pandemic and beyond. The development offers many unique amenities, including a bike room, dog washing station and an electric car charger at the unit’s parking space. There are common outdoor areas perfect for hosting gatherings, exterior walking routes and a lounge. Great location close to West Oakland BART, downtown Oakland, and easy freeway access. Ghost Town Brewing, Orbit Coffee, Horn Barbecue, Soba Ichi and Pacific Pipe Climbing are but a few of the notable neighborhood favorites to explore.

VIEWS, VIEWS, VIEWS, this charming, mid-century level-in home displays the SF Skyline to the Golden Gate Bridge with sweeping views of the glorious golf course below. Set back from the street for privacy, the front courtyard offers a lovely garden and terrace for outdoor entertaining. Enter this home to the main level with living room, dining room kitchen, powder bathroom and primary suite with fireplace. Lower level offer 2 beds/1 bath, large media room and storage area for possible expansion. Both floors feature west facing decks for indoor/outdoor living. This lovely Upper Rockridge home is quiet and private, yet minutes from popular restaurants, shopping and freeways.

Located in the heart of the vibrant Laurel neighborhood, this remodeled and light-filled two bedroom, one bath home is move-in ready! Enter through the redwood gate and into a lush, water-wise California cottage garden that brings abundant blossoms spring through summer, followed by loads of passionfruit and pineapple guava in the fall and winter. Enjoy it all from the welcoming front porch. The house features bamboo floors, a cozy fireplace in the living room, energy-efficient central heat, and an eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and Corian countertop. The attached garage has laundry and storage, all with a code-compliant sewer & recent seismic retrofit. Just a short distance to great local restaurants and taprooms. Sequoia Diner, Degrees Plato, Ghost Town Brewing, boutiques, organic grocers like Farmer Joe's and The Food Mill. Convenient access to highways 580 & 13 plus direct transbay bus service to Downtown Oakland and San Francisco.

AGENTS: SHOW YOUR CLIENTS! COMING SOON BUT AVAILABLE. Lower Rockridge classic foursquare! 4 bedrooms 1.5 baths, great light, built ins, wainscotting, coved ceilings and hardwood floors. The family room faces the backyard and oversized garage (reduce garage for larger yard?). This was a loving family home since the 1970s, and the siblings have now all moved away, so it is ready to help you make new memories. Walkscore 92 and Bikescore 99!

Montclair Beauty! This 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom home with interiors beautifully remodeled and stylishly appointed is nestled in the serene Oakland hills. The main level opens into the bright living room with a fireplace and adjacent dining room overlooking the deck to enjoy gorgeous views! The spacious kitchen with new stainless-steel appliances and abundant cabinetry connects to the deck allowing for indoor/outdoor living, perfect for dining al fresco and your zoom meetings. Downstairs, 1 bedroom is the ideal place to relax and unwind after a busy day. There is also an independent access through the side stairs to the lower bedroom & bonus room. Laundry hook ups in the storage room. Top rated schools, small town feeling and close proximity to parks. Convenient location within a short commute to downtown San Francisco and Oakland Airport.

DO MISS OUT THIS GEM!!! GREAT PRICE! Award-winning Pacific Cannery Lofts by David Baker -QUITE & SAFE Community--Building gated community. Great ground floor 2-level LOFT with a private patio serene view of the courtyard. Super Quite and Cozy. Wonderful open concept living space. 2 minutes bus ride to West Oakland Bart 7 Min Bart Ride to San Francisco! 2 minutes drive to Bay Bridge A central location perfect for anyone trying to cut commuting time. Open kitchen with modern cabinetry - Appliances include: refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, electric oven/range. Shower/tub combo in the bathroom - In-unit washer/dryer - 1-car parking in the gated garage - Gorgeous, tended courtyard with seating - Secure building with intercom/telephone entry system - Walking distance to great cafes & restaurants; Close to Target, Home Depot, and Safeway. Easy access to freeways, the Bay Bridge, Amtrac. Great shopping, dining & entertainment nearby @ Bay Street Mall, Ikea, & AMC Movie Theater.

This bright and charming 1912 Oakland Craftsman was fully renovated just 5 years ago. Located on a quiet park block, this home has three bedrooms and large bath all on one level. The open concept kitchen features a stainless steel appliance suite, maple cabinets, granite counters, and bar seating. Honed hardwood veneer flooring and elegant crown molding help to make this home feel warm and sophisticated. The serene backyard retreat features an entertaining deck above a private lawn, raised vegetable beds, and citrus trees. The lower level's bonus/flex space is large enough for multiple uses including work from home space. This home is wired for AT&T Fiber. Your white picket fenced home awaits you!

A sweet Oakland home radiating with curb appeal, this turn-of-the-century gem has been lovingly maintained over the years. Edged in fragrant roses, a charming front yard is encircled with classic white picket fencing. Splashed with a cheery, sky-blue hue, a timeless facade gives way to a 752-square foot, shotgun-style interior. The perfect home for urbanites, this one-bedroom, one-bathroom bungalow offers a cozy respite from the everyday noise. At the front, a lovely living room with a trio of windows overlooks the front yard. Beyond the living room lies a vibrant bathroom with ornate tile flooring and a gracious bedroom. A generous kitchen with stainless-steel fridge offers a sunny breakfast area and extra pantry space. Sliding glass doors lead outward to a sunlit mudroom with stacked washer and dryer. Beyond the back door lies a shady outdoor seating area dotted with drought-resistant greenery. Located blocks to Ashby BART and a lovely weekly farmer’s market.

If you're looking for a beautifully updated condo, with abundant natural night and amazing views, while just blocks from shops and restaurants this is the one! Located in the desirable Adams Point neighborhood this Two Bedroom unit is just 2 blocks from Lake Merritt. Updates include: Air conditioning, all new oak wood floors, new kitchen counters, new SS appliances, new bathroom cabinets and countertops, new paint, and dual pane windows throughout. You'll find your very own washer/dryer located in the unit along with abundant storage options. In this rarely available top floor space you can watch the sunset from the large balcony overlooking the lake and city skyline. Enjoy an active lifestyle at the parks, meet new people at the local coffee shops, and enjoy the local Farmers Market every Saturday. Plus a full sized secure parking space and guest parking. https://www.cribflyer.com/389-belmont-street-405-oakland-94610#card-id-320784

Charming white picket fence home with curb appeal in one of the hottest neighborhoods in Oakland. Sun kissed home with bamboo hardwood floors and separate dining area and newer light fixtures. Recently renovated large eat-in kitchen with granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, tile floors with roomy bonus pantry area. Separate laundry closet with stackable washer/dryer to keep things tidy. Ample off-street parking with driveway for multiple vehicles. Large unfinished basement for expansion potential. Central location near Laurel shops, restaurants, Fruitvale restaurants and BART.

A premier penthouse with private outdoor space and breathtaking 360-degree views of the East Bay, 492 Staten, Suite 1201 is the epitome of luxury. The timeless design of this two-bedroom, two-bath unit with in-unit laundry and ample storage is enhanced by parquet floors and wide arched windows, and the kitchen and both bathrooms have been tastefully updated. Situated among the top floors shared with only one other unit, the home features a rare library, breathtaking solarium, and expansive outdoor patio for al fresco dining or watching the sun sinking below the horizon. An original cast concrete fireplace graces a corner of the living room, a space dominated by two picture windows framing stunning views of Lake Merritt. Designed by renowned architect Herman Baumann, the exquisite Art Deco Bellevue-Staten Building has been a fixture of the city's skyline since 1929, and is now on the National Register of Historic Places.

Wonderful, spacious traditional home offering privacy galore from its corner location with ample parking and ez commute options. Enjoy level enclosed yard with patio and access from family room and stairs leading to lower level yard and upstairs to main floor entertainment area. Home offers 3 bedrooms 2 full baths with a roof garden off the main bedroom area to enjoy warm summer evenings beneath the stars. Great room floorplan with gourmet kitchen, refinished floors and windows framing treetop views. Interior access to 2-car garage and ample driveway parking. Ready for you. Pls contact Laurel for more information.

address: 1909 San Pablo Ave Unit B, Oakland, CA 94612
description: This bright and spacious top-floor corner unit flat in the heart of Oakland’s vibrant Uptown features modern updates paired with enchanting Victorian-era architecture. Highlights include soaring 14-foot ceilings, hardwood floors, 10-foot windows, and classic details like custom millwork and 6-panel doors with fluted glass handles. The updated gourmet kitchen has granite countertops, stainless appliances, wood cabinetry, and a skylight. The kitchen is open to an expansive dining area with an elegant gas fireplace. The large living room is extended by a sunny 12-foot high bay window and has a second gas fireplace along with beautiful millwork. The generously sized bedroom is highlighted by ornate wainscoting and a cedar-lined closet. Limestone tile spans the bathroom and the foyer, which has a coat closet and a large loft storage area situated above. Incredible location surrounded by amazing dining and shopping. Only a quarter mile to BART, easy access to the bus/train/ferry/freeway.

Rare, coveted corner unit w/ 3 walls of windows and just 1 shared wall, boasting serene views of the Oakland hills on one side, lush garden views from the other. Tri-level townhome w/ a chic vibe, smart layout & an open concept, all in the heart of vibrant West Oakland. Lovely bamboo wood floors flow through the main level w/ soaring ceilings & impressive wood beamed steel framed staircase w/ open treads. Beautiful kitchen has granite counters, under cabinet lighting, large pantry, newer appliances, & breakfast bar with stylish Edison pendant light. A glass door leads to a private deck overlooking the gorgeous common garden space. Half bath present on main level. Two bedrooms, two full baths on the upper level w/ ample closets & nice separation of space. Large garage w/ interior access offers extra space for a home gym plus the area near a window is perfect for a work-from-home lifestyle. Custom plantation shutters & rustic wall sconces are unique upgrades. Ultra-convenient location.

It was a rainy day when we first saw 3739 Hillview Street in 2015. Charcoal hazed clouds engulfed the soft blue stucco of this sweet corner Tudor located in the middle of a double cul-de-sac. The gracious front porch w/ an old-school wooden screen door welcomed us in & the living room w/ large picture window, gumwood doors & trim & original light fixtures warmed my heart. Some homes emanate character, coziness & charisma & Jen & Ihab knew immediately that this house was the one. With 3 bdrms & 2 baths staggered in this split-level home, everyone has a bit of privacy, but are still nearby. There is a formal dining room & a classic kitchen w/ garden window, nook & handmade walnut slab countertops w/ floating shelves made by local wood craftsman. Meaningful improvements were made such as landscaping & hardscaping by Sita, a new picture window, laundry/ mudroom renovation, & tankless water heater, (2018). Located close to the best of the Dimond and Laurel.

Oakland / Piedmont border w/ DIRECT OPEN AIR ACCESS to this sheik mid mod condo. Almost 900 SF. Large 1 BR, 1 BA flat feels incredibly private. Fresh floors & refreshed kitchen / bath, along w/ all the elements you see & touch everyday, have been thoughtfully updated w/ designer look. New appliances, designer paint, light fixtures, countertops & tile backsplash, faucets, garbage disposal, Nest Thermostat, vanity cabinets, bathroom tile floor, carpet, dual pane windows, glass closet doors. Don’t miss the dining room adjacent to the kitchen and the wallpapered office alcove w/ storage & closet organizers! Every detail has been considered so you could move right in from day one. Perfect place for first-time homeowners looking to build equity or perhaps a local family who wants a nearby living arrangement for a relative. Rare 1 car garage w/ bonus storage locker, PLUS a 2nd tandem parking spot. Lovely shared garden & picnic/BBQ area shows pride of ownership. Don’t miss a RARE opportunity!

Welcome home to this mid-century modern 1960 home with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths located on an large lot. Located in the heart of the Montclair Hills. The living room features Oak wood random plank flooring and a floor to ceiling traditional brick fireplace. The kitchen is equipped with built-in appliances and lots of countertop and cabinet storage space. The kitchen cabinetry is cherry wood. The adjacent dining room is spacious with room to entertain and access to the large flat patio. The flooring in the kitchen and dining room is quality Amtico laminate. Hardwood floors throughout the home. The guest bath has a shower over tub, and the master bath has a big stall shower. Both bathrooms feature travertine tile. The home has a large patio accessible from sliding patio doors in the kitchen/dining areas and from the living room. The garden wraps around the entire property and includes many varietals of plants and flowers. Attached garage with interior access!

Embraced by a mature oak forest, your new Sequoyah home is prone to tree-top serenades of wild birds. The spring sun shines bright as you take in the clean fresh air on your private back deck & contemplate a day well lived. The backdrop is simply gorgeous & the walls of glass from the interior invite nature indoors. Tucked in a cul-de-sac, the peace & quiet on Silverado court is savored by neighbors; it's like a secret no one wants to let out! All level, your mid-century rancher may be one for the long-term. Once one moves here, often it's for good as there's so much to offer like the hiking trails of Knowland park & the upcoming amenities of the Oak Knoll community nearby. Warm & inviting, one's first impression upon entry are the classic characteristic exposed beams in the living room with vaulted ceilings that speak to an era of exemplary architecture. Still offering plenty of opportunity for your own tastes to shine, here’s your palette to paint the life you’ve been yearning for.

Charming Upper Rockridge Traditional on the Sonia Street Alley. Warm and inviting, enter the front door to hardwood flooring, natural light and open spaces. The remodeled chefs kitchen leaves nothing to be desired and opens to the rear patio - perfect for indoor/outdoor entertaining. The family room with fireplace is the perfect ambiance for gathering with friends and family. Upstairs, 2 bedrooms and full bath include the primary suite. Downstairs, a guest suite with full bath can also be enjoyed as home office, gym and more. This spectacular location with level-in entry from the alley also allows for potential expansion. Location, light and comfortable style combine to make 131 Sonia Street the perfect place to call home.

Experience resort living year-round at Parkwoods, a gated community nestled at the base of the Claremont Hills just minutes from Elmwood, Montclair, Rockridge, and Orinda shopping and restaurants. This beautifully updated 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo is in a tranquil setting in the far back of the community. The spacious unit has a modern layout featuring an inviting kitchen that opens to the dining and living areas with a fireplace and direct access to a private terrace. Updates include gorgeous engineered hardwood floors and new stainless steel kitchen appliances. Enjoy a beautiful outdoor swimming pool, well-equipped gym, spa, sauna, clubhouse, and verdant grounds. Close proximity to regional parks for outdoor recreation; ideal location for commutes in many directions: near BART, freeways, and SF Transbay commuter bus.

With 2 beds & 1 bath upstairs and a complete studio downstairs, this fixer upper is a perfect investor opportunity in the Oakland Hills. The downstairs studio has a separate entrance, full bath, and kitchen hookups for a potential in-law unit or ADU with rental income. Panoramic views of the Bay Area, include the GG Bridge, Bay Bridge, the downtown SF skyline, & Sutro Tower. The living room features an exposed beam cathedral ceiling and views of SF. The U-shaped floor plan wraps around a private brick courtyard with views across the Bay & a built-in grill. The master bedroom has yet more transbay views from 2 sides of the room & the oversized bathroom has a corner soaking tub. It also has arched walkways, hardwood floors & the roof is only 3-4 years young.A virtually renovated image is included to show the home’s potential. This is a handyman’s special that needs TLC. Extensive renovations & repairs are needed. Please use extreme caution on the stairs leading up to the home. All inform

Experience smiles & happiness every day w/ panoramic views of the Golden Gate Bridge, Bay Bridge, San Francisco Skyline, Mt Tam, city lights, & rolling hills. Enjoy stunning views from the living room, dining room, master bedroom, & office w/ its fabulous floor plan. The formal living & dining room can entertain even the largest parties, w/ the gourmet kitchen w/ eat in nook give way to serene back yard views. Step into a spacious family room w/ wet bar perfect for indoor/outdoor entertaining. Upstairs the grand master bedroom with walk in closet & en-suite bathroom has views from every window. The next room is a perfect flex as an office, or a bedroom with its own incredible views. Across is a sizeable bedroom with its own bathroom w/ own peaceful backyard views leading down towards Lake Temescal. Another large bedroom w/ hallway bath complete the incredible floorplan. This stylish home wrapped in glass is a forever home. Don't miss this rare opportunity, it will not last!

Unique one bedroom loft at Pacific Cannery Lofts. Development was constructed in 2009. This two story unit is equipped with stainless steel appliances, in unit washer and dryer and patio. The lower level features an open concept living room/kitchen, half bath and exposed concrete pillars with access to the front patio area. Upper level features a spacious master suite and full bath with laundry in closet. Community amenities include dog washing station, bike storage, gated community and EV charging station for every parking space. Unit comes with one garage parking and plenty of street parking. Virtual tour link here: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=TkrbW9jLyo7&mls=1.

Delightful bungalow located on a tree-lined street in the heart of Rockridge; Hardwood floors and vintage details complement modern amenities throughout; Features a lovely family room with original built-in cabinetry and fireplace, a formal dining room, an updated eat-in kitchen with stainless appliances, a nice bathroom w/ rare claw foot maid's tub, a large home office / nursery w/ expansive views overlooking the neighborhood, and two quiet bedrooms for slumbering through the night; Includes a large rear deck for indoor / outdoor dining and entertaining; A lushly landscaped rear yard is a gardener's paradise; A dedicated driveway leads to an attached garage / innovation lab; Large utility room w/ washer / dryer located on the lower level; Enjoy the best of both worlds – a serene retreat in the midst of the hustle and bustle of one of the most desirable locations in Rockridge, just steps from shops and restaurants on College Ave., Rockridge BART and highly regarded Emerson Elementary!

Delightful 3BD/2BA storybook Tudor in coveted Oakmore with flat, verdant, parklike backyard! Bright & charming with 1932 period details, tasteful updates, gleaming hardwood floors, spacious bedrooms, cosmetic updates to lower level bath & laundry adjoin oversized family room that opens on to deck. Partially finished bonus space offers expansion potential and perfect as exercise, study or zoom room! Stroll out your door to neighborhood creek trails, Dimond Park Pool, or explore the many staircases for sweeping views of San Francisco. You’ll love the easy access to Rocky’s Gourmet Market for Roti Chicken on Monday’s or gathering with neighbors on Sunday's where local Food Trucks line the parking lot in summer. Ideal location close to Transbay Express, top private & public schools, and fine dining restaurants in Glenview & Montclair’s shopping districts. On the market for the first time in 25 years, this special home is not to be missed!

Reminiscent of a Tuscan villa, grand in scale, private, with modern, versatile open layout and terraced garden, 65 Hiller Drive is an expansive 5BD/3.5BA, 4816 square foot, level-in, level-out Contemporary with optional 2-bedroom full service in-law, nestled on a hillside in the coveted Claremont Hills neighborhood. Large high-ceilinged rooms bathed in natural light blend a modern aesthetic with a quiet hilltop setting and gorgeous bay and bridge views. Enjoying gleaming hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, skylights, and tall windows overlooking the bay, the home is perfect for elegant entertaining with its gracious open common area and many outdoor spaces. The home also features a spacious chef's kitchen with breakfast nook, family room, opulent owner's suite, and wood-paneled library. A lush gated courtyard, wrap-around patio, and tranquil gardens are ideal for alfresco entertaining.

Rare 2BD/2.5BA vintage Mid-Century Contemporary two-story project home, with detached garage with bonus studio/office space, in a lovely Berkeley locale, close to the Lawrence Hall of Science, Tilden Park and Berkeley's Northside. 1510 Grizzly Peak features a FLR with floor-to-ceiling windows and view balcony w/Canyon views, an adjoining dining area, a galley kitchen, and a full guest bath off the formal entry, all on the main living level. Downstairs are 2 ample BDs w/floor-to-ceiling windows, and a 2nd full BA, PLUS a bonus room off the hallway for hobbies or storage. The home is nestled on a 5,226 Sq Ft lot that features a private rear patio, a terraced yard ready for gardening, and a two-car garage at the top of the lot with a bonus studio/home office and bath. Overall, this offering represents a prime opportunity for handy Mid-Century enthusiasts & professional investors looking for a home in need of substantial rehab and/or possibly expand to their exact tastes & specifications.

Stunning Mediterranean! Alluring home offers select finishes and desirable floorplan. Delightful level-in foyer with graceful arches ushers you to the formal living and dining rooms which flow seamlessly to the kitchen/family room and to sheltered deck, patio and tiered garden, perfect for outdoor entertaining. Dream kitchen utilizes the most luxurious materials available while functioning perfectly for the inspired cook. A bedroom, bath and 2-car garage complete the main. Upstairs is a luxurious owner's suite with sitting room, wall of windows to private terrace, Bay views, oversized custom closet and luxurious bathroom. Two more bedrooms, bath and laundry room complete this level. The lower level has a recreation room large enough for a pool table with a private outdoor entrance. Prime Montclair location with sidewalks and wide streets near Montclair village, Rockridge, transportation and Lake Temescal.

Redesigned traditional with bay views! Walkscore 72! Nestled into Montclair hills, blocks to village shops, trails, parks, farmer's markets and all major transportation. One of the best locations in Montclair, high enough for stunning views and close enough to take trails to coffee! Upper Level features two bedrooms, remodeled bath, large open terrace w/porch swing. Additional bedroom and bath on lower level, perfect for guests, home office, second living room or bedroom. Lower level has its own entry. Large level grassy area perfect for play and gardening. Living room with updated fireplace and built-ins opens to large private deck. Take your zoom call while basking in the sun and enjoying views of the bay! Remodeled kitchen opens to living and dining room. Additional 1/2 bath off kitchen. Ideal indoor outdoor flow with open floor plan. Two car garage with interior access. Close to top rated schools and much more! Square footage does not match public records. Buyer to verify.

Beautifully updated home in the rolling green hills of Millsmont has been nearly completely renovated. This cute cozy abode offers an open family kitchen concept with a breakfast nook beside the warm bay windows. Chic gourmet kitchen is equipped w/ island breakfast bar, ss appliances, shaker cabinets, Calcutta slab quartz, skylight & decorative subway tiles fully backsplashed. Spacious bedrooms are bright w/ many windows. Bathrooms are an artwork of modern convenience. New plumbing, new tankless wh, new electrical system, new central heating & ductwork, new gutters, new rear roof, stamped & colored concrete backyard patio & terraced retaining decorative walls, too many improvements to list here. Exceptional views of the rolling hills & valley below from spacious terraced backyard. Long time friendly neighbors, conveniently located near shopping, freeways & quaint eateries. Must See!

Delightful bungalow located on a tree-lined street in the heart of Rockridge; Hardwood floors and vintage details complement modern amenities throughout; Features a lovely family room with original built-in cabinetry and fireplace, a formal dining room, an updated eat-in kitchen with stainless appliances, a nice bathroom w/ rare claw foot maid's tub, a large home office / nursery w/ expansive views overlooking the neighborhood, and two quiet bedrooms for slumbering through the night; Includes a large rear deck for indoor / outdoor dining and entertaining; A lushly landscaped rear yard is a gardener's paradise; A dedicated driveway leads to an attached garage / innovation lab; Large utility room w/ washer / dryer located on the lower level; Enjoy the best of both worlds – a serene retreat in the midst of the hustle and bustle of one of the most desirable locations in Rockridge, just steps from shops and restaurants on College Ave., Rockridge BART and highly regarded Emerson Elementary!

Mixed use property. Used as commercial space on lower areas. 2 apartments on upper level. Units easy to rent. Occupied by good tenants. Lower units used as offices but could be built out for other purposes. Great corner lot with lots of traffic on Bancroft Ave.

Wonderful opportunity to own a duplex in Oaklands San Antonio neighborhood. The upstairs unit features 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms with an updated kitchen. Unit unit has a flex space that can be used as the living room OR 4th bedroom. The bottom unit features 2 bedrooms and 1 bath. Separately metered for gas and electric. The owner pays water and garbage. The spacious backyard features a nice canvas for your urban garden. Two spacious storage sheds just off the back deck. The property is in close proximity to Highland Hospital, San Antonio Park, schools, shops and just 17 blocks from Lake Merritt. Easy access to HWY 580.

Welcome to your modern, urban dweller’s paradise in the heart of Uptown Oakland. This 2BR/2BA condo at Broadway Grand is possibly one of a kind. You’ll appreciate the enviable private patio which spans the length of the unit. Open the sliders in the living area + owner’s suite to enjoy true indoor/outdoor living in a verdant oasis in the center of The Town. The living area features a nook that’s an ideal flex space for a home office, workout space, or both! The spacious kitchen has granite counters + a gas range. The bedrooms are large with lots of closet space; the bathrooms are nicely updated. You’ll love the in-unit washer and dryer, dedicated parking space w/car charging, extra storage unit, and secure garage. With a WalkScore of 99 and as life returns to normal, you'll find so much value in your proximity to the best bars, restaurants, theaters, and farmer's markets in Oakland. Not to mention Lake Merritt, Whole Foods, BART, and major freeways all only a stone’s throw away.

Sunny and bright unit facing the courtyard. Located in Oakland Chinatown with lots of restaurants and easy access to public transportation. Farmer's Market on Fridays on 9th Street. Close to Jack London Square. Easy freeway access and public transportation.

A premier penthouse with private outdoor space and breathtaking 360-degree views of the East Bay, 492 Staten, Suite 1201 is the epitome of luxury. The timeless design of this two-bedroom, two-bath unit with in-unit laundry and ample storage is enhanced by parquet floors and wide arched windows, and the kitchen and both bathrooms have been tastefully updated. Situated among the top floors shared with only one other unit, the home features a rare library, breathtaking solarium, and expansive outdoor patio for al fresco dining or watching the sun sinking below the horizon. An original cast concrete fireplace graces a corner of the living room, a space dominated by two picture windows framing stunning views of Lake Merritt. Designed by renowned architect Herman Baumann, the exquisite Art Deco Bellevue-Staten Building has been a fixture of the city's skyline since 1929, and is now on the National Register of Historic Places.

address: 1134 Foothill Blvd Unit B, Oakland, CA 94606
description: Charming classic Victorian thoughtfully redesigned and transformed into four extraordinary condominiums located just minutes away from Lake Merritt. 1134 Foothill Blvd unit B offers 2 bedrooms, one bathroom, an open floor plan, large bay windows, & a sun filled open living & dining space. Chef's kitchen features expansive countertops, stainless steel appliances, and abundant cabinet space. Perfect for entertaining. Upgrades include: light oak floors, soaring 10+ft ceilings, custom molding, sleek fixtures, central heating, on site laundry, new electrical, plumbing, roof, foundation, windows, & paint. Enjoy the classic architecture with stunning period details combined with the convenience of modern design. Located near great neighborhood restaurants, shopping, farmers markets, Lake Merritt, transit, & Bart. Must See!! 3-d tour, Floor plans, photos, & video tour available at: https://www.foothillblvdcondos.com

Welcome to 1883 Grandview, a stunning Hiller Highlands 3BD/3.5 Townhome w/views to the Bay & beyond, that features the size, amenities & modern conveniences perfect for today's At-Home Lifestyles. Rare, 2001 build in the heart of Oakland’s historic and sought after Crocker Highlands neighborhood. This sophisticated brown shingle has been beautifully updated with a fresh modern look. An exceptional Downtown location, you’ll be in proximity to Preservation Park, BART, Uptown, Jack London, Old Town, highways, China Town and Oakland’s central business district. Lovingly maintained North Oakland Craftsman in the Golden Gate district, retains all of the classic lines on the exterior, with an open and modern interior. This charming 4 bedroom 2 bath 1890s Victorian home offers vintage charm with modern comfort. The home features new interior paint, large updated kitchen with granite countertops, high ceilings, an inviting formal living room with a beautiful bay window & the original fireplace, a formal dining room & much more. Original wood plank flooring is still there waiting to be exposed. Enjoy the private nicely landscaped yard with wrought iron fencing, many fruit trees & gorgeous flowers that bloom thru-out the year. This property is a gardener's delight! Plenty of off-street parking. You will be walking/biking distance to the Oakland Museum, the new A's stadium at Howard Terminal & the new waterfront shops and restaurants at Brooklyn Basin. This home is minutes from downtown Oakland, Chinatown, Jack London Square/Ferry Building, Lake Merritt Bart, Amtrak, major hospitals & downtown San Francisco is only 13 miles away.

Delightful bungalow located on a tree-lined street in the heart of Rockridge; Hardwood floors and vintage details complement modern amenities throughout; Features a lovely family room with original built-in cabinetry and fireplace, a formal dining room, an updated eat-in kitchen with stainless appliances, a nice bathroom w/ rare claw foot maid's tub, a large home office / nursery w/ expansive views overlooking the neighborhood, and two quiet bedrooms for slumbering through the night; Includes a large rear deck for indoor / outdoor dining and entertaining; A lushly landscaped rear yard is a gardener's paradise; A dedicated driveway leads to an attached garage / innovation lab; Large utility room w/ washer / dryer located on the lower level; Enjoy the best of both worlds – a serene retreat in the midst of the hustle and bustle of one of the most desirable locations in Rockridge, just steps from shops and restaurants on College Ave., Rockridge BART and highly regarded Emerson Elementary!

Charismatic bungalow in the heart of Rockridge; One of two twin homes next door to each other for sale by the same owner (454 & 456 Cavour) - buyers have the option of purchasing one or both at the offer deadline; Open floor plan with lots of windows and light yet still private by virtue of sitting comfortably above street level; Box-beam ceilings and wainscoting compliment modern amenities throughout, including an updated kitchen and bath; Rear yard is fully fenced and kid and pet friendly and includes plenty of space for gardening, dining and entertaining; A detached garage / innovation lab is ideal for both artistic and entrepreneurial endeavours; Features a full sized unfinished lower level bonus space; A+ Rockridge location close to everywhere you want to be in both Rockridge and Temescal (including both BART stations); Close to shops and restaurants on College, Piedmont and Telegraph Avenues; Feeds to pioneering Emerson elementary and top-ranked Oakland Tech nearby.

Redesigned serene home in Oakland hills on friendly private street. Minutes to downtown, Montclair, regional trails, Chabot Space & Science Center, parks and top rated schools! Set back from the street w/ a deep front yard & surprisingly generous bkyd & patio, owned by the same family for 40 yrs. Expanded by the current owner to its existing size, a generous 5 bdrm, 2 bath home w/ 2 fireplaces, & many thoughtful touches. Formal entry opens to a generous living & dining room w/ barrel ceiling & handsome charcoal gas-insert fireplace & natural light floods through the radius front window. 3 bedrooms & a full bath downstairs & 2 bdrms & a bath upstairs, this home provides a flexible floor plan if you work from home or want a sizable home to stretch out in. Designer touches have been added throughout, such as front & back doors newly painted in Venezuelan Sea, solid oak hardwood was installed to the majority of the downstairs floor & updated kitchen. Cynthia will forever hold the memories of the many celebrations that she hosted, often in her backyard, including when Cynthia’s granddaughter ate so many oranges off the orange tree that her lips were chapped.

Rare, coveted corner unit w/ 3 walls of windows and just 1 shared wall, boasting serene views of the Oakland hills on one side, lush garden views from the other. Lovely bamboo wood floors flow through the main level w/ soaring ceilings & impressive wood beamed steel framed staircase w/ open treads. Beautiful kitchen has granite counters, under cabinet lighting, large pantry, newer appliances, & breakfast bar with stylish Edison pendant light. A glass door leads to a private deck overlooking the gorgeous common garden space. Half bath present on main level. Two bedrooms, two full baths on the upper level w/ ample closets & nice separation of space. Custom plantation shutters & rustic wall sconces are unique upgrades. Ultra-convenient location.

Rare opportunity to own this sunny tranquil 4 bed 3 bath split-level Montclair retreat. Close to the village bustle yet tucked off the main st on a private road & surrounded by nature. Footsteps away and direct access to the Bay Bridge, 580/80/880 Freeways, quick drive to Uptown's Vibrant dining, shops and entertainment venues.

description: Stylish Mid-Century with sparkling San Francisco Bay views situated on a large lot just over a quarter acre; ideal for the urban farmer. Perfectly set in the heart and soul of Jingletown. This sumptuously modern industrial chic loft-style condo is built around a landscaped courtyard & fountain with direct access to the Park Street Bridge estuary boardwalk. Soaring 16' ceilings in the main living space and finished concrete floors adds sophistication to this unique home. Desirable open concept living connecting living, dining and kitchen finely styled with modern sconces & pendant lighting. All situated perfectly for the discerning host or hostess. Unique rustic French doors open to a bedroom that's currently used as an office and offers a full bath w/ tub and washer/dryer in closet and has access to a private outdoor patio much needed now for safe entertaining, or to escape the stresses of the day. address: 760 Canyon Oaks Dr Unit F, Oakland, CA 94605
