address: 1909 San Pablo Ave Unit B, Oakland, CA 94612
description: This bright and spacious top-floor corner unit flat in the heart of Oakland’s vibrant Uptown features modern updates paired with enchanting Victorian-era architecture. Highlights include soaring 14-foot ceilings, hardwood floors, 10-foot windows, and classic details like custom millwork and 6-panel doors with fluted glass handles. The updated gourmet kitchen has granite countertops, stainless appliances, wood cabinetry, and a skylight. The kitchen is open to an expansive dining area with an elegant gas fireplace. The large living room is extended by a sunny 12-foot high bay window and has a second gas fireplace along with beautiful millwork. The generously sized bedroom is highlighted by ornate wainscoting and a cedar-lined closet. Limestone tile spans the bathroom and the foyer, which has a coat closet and a large loft storage area situated above. Incredible location surrounded by amazing dining and shopping. Only a quarter mile to BART, easy access to the bus/train/ferry/freeway.

address: 5321 Miles Ave Unit Z, Oakland, CA 94618
description: 5321 Miles Ave Unit Z is a visionary, tranquil eco-modernist 2-story end unit, entered through a lush communal atrium+courtyard. Built in 1979, the project was designed by architects Lee Porter Butler & Williams Pearson as the 1st "multi-family housing project utilizing the thermal envelope concept.” Many bohemian 70's era modern design elements; exposed I-beams, thick plank wood siding, massive wood deck+balcony, panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows/sliding glass doors,& multiple skylights. Tastefully appointed w/ parquet wood floors, wool carpet on stairs, bamboo flooring upstairs, & artisan tiling in kitchen/bathrooms. Kitchen has a natural edge Redwood slab counter, wood cabinets, large pantry, deep steel basin, range oven, & fridge. Both bedrooms have verdant views & are ample size. Walk-in closets! Unique craft or zoom room off full bath. In-unit laundry rm! 1 car garage w/ storage/workbench. Incredible Rockridge location near Frog Park, BART,& College Ave! 89Walkscore/92Bikescore!

Pristine, chic Mediterranean in the heart of Rockridge, perched above the street for privacy. Entrance includes terrace and custom tile work with peek-of-the-bay views. Blocks to College Ave, Market Hall, award winning Chabot Elementary, Zachary's & Trader Joes. Urban Dweller’s dream location. 3BD/2Bath. Additional living room w/fireplace & closet can be used as home office, guest room or additional bedroom. Formal dining room w/built ins and barn door. Grand living room with vaulted ceilings and fireplace. Living room opens to serene garden, ideal for entertaining and play. Custom kitchen w/concrete counters, stainless appliances and office nook. Newer spa like bathroom w/spa tub. Large two car garage and additional utility room with interior access. The best of Rockridge living! It is midnight & you are scrolling new listings on your phone, hoping to find a home that fits your needs, you are looking for a spacious property w/ lg. rooms to really stretch out in. You want a lg. primary bedroom w/ en-suite bathroom & walk-in closet, 4 bedrooms on the same level & great indoor-outdoor flow. Unassuming from the front exterior, but once you enter inside the front door you are greeted by a handsome stacked stone fireplace w/ gas insert, crisp white wood ceiling w/ beam accent open to a formal dining room that flows to the backyard & kitchen. The backyard was a true labor of love, owners Mike & Jen had a vision to transform their large backyard that had an old neglected pool, into a tropical playground inspired by Hawaiian memories. The backyard was completely transformed & scores of hand-selected plants were sown to envelop the private outdoors into your exclusive sanctuary. Updated kitchen, 2 updated bathrooms, dual-paned windows, new roof, 2 furnaces & much more.

Located in a neighborhood filled with artists, this luxurious townhouse style corner condominium is just a short distance from the Oakland Estuary and all of the goodness on Park Street in Alameda. With a lofted ceiling and abundance of windows, the first thing you’ll notice when you step up to the main level is the incredible natural light. The unit has a great layout with the kitchen opening onto the dining space and living room, easy for entertaining. Off the living room is an easy indoor/outdoor flow to a private balcony. Upstairs is a lofted bonus space, perfect for a home office. The primary bedroom is en suite with a large walk-in closet. The unit has a tandem garage with loads of space! Within just blocks are both the Fruitvale BART station and an SF express bus pick up making a future commute into the city a breeze!

1924 Tudor Revival with City & Lake Merritt views in easy-commute, low-turnover Haddon Hill. Strollable to Lake Merritt, Lakeshore/Grand shopping, movies, farmer’s market. High-ceilinged living room: hardwood floors, adjacent entertaining view terrace, arched view alcove (library, cocktail bar), gas fireplace. Light-filled dining room. Stairs up to view landing. Remodeled kitchen: quartz counters, white cabinets, double Silgranit sink, s/s appliances including Bosch DW and Dacor range, pantry wall, prep island. Wood-top breakfast bar with picture window--sip your coffee viewing Lake Merritt! Stairs from kitchen to lower level: Bedroom/Family room, yoga/gym/office room. Laundry room/full bath, washer/dryer, clothes folding counter. Big workshop, storage, interior access garage. Backyard: deck, benches, pergolas, fruit trees, swings.

It was a rainy day when we first saw 3739 Hillview Street in 2015. Charcoal hazed clouds engulfed the soft blue stucco of this sweet corner Tudor located in the middle of a double cul-de-sac. The gracious front porch w/ an old-school wooden screen door welcomed us in & the living room w/ large picture window, gumwood doors & trim & original light fixtures warmed my heart. Some homes emanate character, coziness & charisma & Jen & Ihab knew immediately that this house was the one. With 3 bdrms & 2 baths staggered in this split-level home, everyone has a bit of privacy, but are still nearby. There is a formal dining room & a classic kitchen w/ garden window, nook & handmade walnut slab countertops w/ floating shelves made by local wood craftsman. Meaningful improvements were made such as landscaping & hardscaping by Sita, a new picture window, laundry/ mudroom renovation, & tankless water heater, (2018). Located close to the best of the Dimond and Laurel.

Ideally located in the Montclair hills, you will love spending time at home in this majestic Mediterranean home flooded with natural light and bursting with style. A generously sized living room adorned with oversized windows and high ceilings allow the surrounding natural beauty of the area to become the backdrop of your everyday life. The open kitchen and dining room with terra cotta tile provide ample space to whip up your next culinary creation. Open the french doors off the dining area to create an indoor-outdoor flow perfect for entertaining in our gorgeous bay area weather. Up the staircase adorned with geometric wallpaper, you will find 3 spacious bedrooms each with its own unique character of nooks and built-ins. An updated emerald bathroom with marble and chrome finishes complete the interior. Out the back door, you'll find a private deck with stone fireplace where you'll relax and toast to the end of the day under the vibrant colors of sunset. Welcome home.

Fantastic modern condo in the heart of West Oakland. Boasting high ceilings and windows that run nearly floor-to-ceiling, this gorgeous split-level unit welcomes a flood of natural light. other_agents: RACHEL TROWBRIDGE SAUNDERS - Keller Williams Realty
description: Located on a tranquil street in the sought-after Glenview neighborhood, 3715 Woodruff is a delightful 2BD/2BA Craftsman bungalow with enchanting front and rear gardens and a wonderful detached studio/home office. Lovingly maintained, the home enjoys elegant period features balanced by stylish modern upgrades. High ceilings, gleaming hardwood floors, and charming built-ins retain the character of the architectural style, while the modern kitchen and baths offer comfort and convenience. An easily accessible basement houses a laundry area and abundant storage space, and a long driveway provides off-street tandem parking. Conveniently located near Sausal Creek, Dimond Park and Lions Pool, the home is moments from Park Blvd restaurants and shops, Montclair, Farmer Joe’s Marketplace, and commuter access to BART and AC Transit bus lines.

Large 4-unit apartment complex consisting of four 2bd/1bth units with solid cash flow and excellent rental upside. 6.75% cap rate and 10.11 on current rents! The property offers 3,340 square feet of rental spaces and sits on a large 5,495 square foot lot that offers 6+ parking spaces and room to potentially build an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU). The current owner recently addressed all deferred maintenance and spent over $25,000 on capital improvements to deliver a turn-key investment for the next owner. The roof is relatively new and the electrical system and foundation have both been upgraded. Maintenance and repairs are low, and all units are separately metered for PG&E providing for low annual expenses. The units have spacious floor plans, classic details, hardwood floors and great light. The property is located adjacent to the Fairfax Business District in close proximity to restaurants, shopping, public transportation, and multiple BART stations.

Vintage, modern 1939 bungalow on a spacious corner lot in popular, convenient Upper Laurel. Stoll up your corner walkway surrounded by a young redwood, front lawn, flower beds. Charming front porch opens to entry, living room, dining full of light & charm: curved plaster ceilings, tiled fireplace, niche, built-in shelves, corner picture window. Open arched dining room. Kitchen: Tiled wall over quartz counters, white cabinets, mini-pantry, s/s sink, appliances. Open archway to family room: built-in bar, wall of glass windows, French doors to fenced, level, full of sun backyard: brick patio, lawn, flower/veggie beds. Bedrooms: primary suite over family room: mini-deck, ensuite bath: marble floors, tiled shower over tub (glass doors), vanity sink. Via front hall: 2 bedrooms (cedar-floor closets), bath (marble tile, glass door & tiled shower over tub, linen closet with w/d. Garage under house, work benches. Near Hwys 13 & 580, Laurel/Dimond shopping, urban paths, walks, parks, hikes.

Welcome to your new Home!! Must see spacious 2 bedroom 1 bath with fireplace! Backyard deck and storage shed! and plenty of space to entertain. With proximity to the 580 freeway, Mills College, the Oakland Coliseum, and miles of hiking trails in the East Bay hills, this investment offers enduring appeal for both the renter and the savvy portfolio alike.

Downstairs features a large basement with Laundry and Attached Garage. Spacious, flat backyard. Many items have been done including New Sewer, New Breaker Panel, New Paint in/out. Sidewalk is certified. Comp roof age is unknown but not very old! This property is ready for your clients creative design touches to shine!!

description: Stunning and spacious condo on the Oakland/Emeryville border! Features three bedrooms plus a loft, perfect for working from home. This open layout is perfect for entertaining. A large bedroom with a walk-in closet and a gorgeous bath remodeled with designer finishes completes this level. The living area opens via an oversized sliding door to a private outdoor patio and deck, ideal for relaxing after a long day. The upper level includes a loft area overlooking the lower level and is an ideal flex space with neighborhood views. The second floor also includes two additional bedrooms and another remodeled full bath. An attached one-car garage is below the unit, and there is an additional driveway parking space. Part of a 4-unit HOA with low fees, and in a great location near shops, restaurants, and transit.

Rare 5bed/3bath home in Upper Rockridge. Gorgeous hardwood floors greet you as you enter. Elegant, sun filled living room with fireplace adjoins the spacious dining room. Quaint, vintage bathroom is close-by. Primary suite is tucked away on the mezzanine level for plenty of privacy; enjoy peek-a-boo views and a sweet balcony. Flexible floor plan with two more bedrooms and bath upstairs. The separate entrance is ideal for a au-pair suite or can serve as home office, media room, guest room. Sunny yard with gazebo, fireplace and vegetable beds: plenty of space for the entire family to enjoy. Great storage and attached 2 car garage with interior access. Minutes to schools, College Ave shops/restaurants, BART and other transport options. Montclair Village also blocks away! https://tinyurl.com/y7m2fddo

Warm and classic 3 bd/2 bath 1920's Bungalow, fully renovated and updated with new EVERYTHING circa 2017, bolted, braced, and seismic retrofit in 2019. This lovely Queen Anne Victorian has an old soul with thoroughly modern charms. Set on a fenced corner lot, its solid street presence is enhanced by its historical details. Highlighted with soaring ceilings and wood trim that’s found throughout, the foyer leads directly into a handsome living room with a gorgeous marble fireplace. Arched doorways, ceiling medallions, intricate plasterwork are offset by a modern and open layout. Through a graceful arch, the formal dining room leads directly to the kitchen - featuring a farmhouse sink, subway tile backsplash and, through a beautiful stained-glass door, access to a fantastic back garden. A deck off the kitchen is ideal for morning coffee, and a dining patio is up a few steps under the trees. Lush and lovely, the garden is landscaped with fruit trees, a massive bird of paradise, jasmine, and a majestic redwood. Both bedrooms have charming en suite bathrooms. As a bonus, the lower level includes a home office, laundry room and storage.
Triplex in Rockridge. 3 one bedroom, one bathroom units. Entered for COMP purposes only.

Fresh and totally renovated (work completed in March '21) top-floor residence, set on two stories. Welcome to your new home in beautiful Leona Heights. Open concept living with wide plank white oak floors and modern design touches. 3BR, 2BA + an office with separate entrance. The back yard is magical - a true sanctuary of citrus and olive trees and expansive views with plenty of space to entertain. A large 2-car garage with high ceilings has endless possibilities, tons of storage and a wine cellar.

other_agents: Scott Leverette - Golden Gate Sothebys Intl Rlty
description: Dubbed The New Albion house and located in an ideal Rockridge location, this elegant traditional ticks all the boxes. Moments from Rockridge park, Prospect steps, and the amenities of Rockridge yet the home is tucked just far enough up to enjoy hill and bay views. A lions head knocker greets you at the front door leading into a gracious entry space. Ahead lies the beautifully updated kitchen with a circular flow to a large rear courtyard, gracious living room, fireplace, and formal dining room. Up the traditional staircase you find city views thru the original leaded glass windows. Large primary bedroom with views, on suite bathroom & walk in closet. Two additional large bedrooms and a remodeled bath share the upper floor with beautiful vistas from every space. Interior access to the 1 car garage and additional off-street parking, plus basement laundry center and even more storage. EZ to SF via BART or the freeway. Welcome home.

Set in quaint Sheffield Village, a pocket neighborhood on the border of Oakland and San Leandro with tree-lined streets and mountain vistas, this 1939 charmer will bring a smile to your face. From the single-level living to the sunny rooms with gleaming hardwood floors and the large private backyard, life is easy at 3016 Revere Ave. The added bonus of the detached 2-car garage gives you extra room for work, fun, or just good old additional storage. Feast on the persimmons, golden delicious apples, apricots, and pluots that grow in the back garden and gather with family and friends on the large back patio. When it is time to venture out, you can stroll to the neighborhood tennis courts, softball field, dog park, rec center, or the Dunsmuir Open Space. If you need to venture further, you’ll find easy freeway access, a bus line, BART, shops, and restaurants all just moments away.

Newly constructed and centrally located in a gated, urban community, this modern townhouse-style condo has been meticulously maintained. Expansive windows allow natural light to fill all 3 levels of the open floorplan, from the upgraded wood floors to the elevated high ceilings. Featuring 2 bedrooms plus a large home office den that can easily be converted into a 3rd bedroom or additional living room, and 2.5 bathrooms, the large primary suite entices with a spacious walk-in closet, dual-vanity sinks, and luxurious shower. The dining area flows into an upgraded kitchen with an abundance of cabinets, Quartz countertops, with a high-end Bertazzoni range. A laundry closet, attached 2-car side by side garage pre-wired for dual EV chargers, a private sun drenched patio, and fully-paid solar panels complete this home. Located in West Oakland, hip eateries, grocery stores, parks, BART, 880, 580, and 80 are just minutes away, making for an ideal commuter location. Welcome home!

Redesigned traditional with bay views! Walkscore 72! Nestled into Montclair hills, blocks to village shops, trails, parks, farmer's markets and all major transportation. One of the best locations in Montclair, high enough for stunning views and close enough to take trails to coffee! Upper Level features two bedrooms, remodeled bath, large open terrace w/porch swing. Additional bedroom and bath on lower level, perfect for guests, home office, second living room or bedroom. Lower level has its own entry. Large level grassy area perfect for play and gardening. Living room with updated fireplace and built-ins opens to large private deck. Take your zoom call while basking in the sun and enjoying views of the bay! Remodeled kitchen opens to living and dining room. Additional 1/2 bath off kitchen. Ideal indoor outdoor flow with open floor plan. Two car garage with interior access. Close to top rated schools and much more! Square footage does not match public records. Buyer to verify.

This charming 4 bedroom 2 bath 1890s Victorian home offers vintage charm with modern comfort. The home features new interior paint, large updated kitchen with granite countertops, high ceilings, an inviting formal living room with a beautiful bay window & the original fireplace, a formal dining room & much more. Original wood plank flooring is still there waiting to be exposed. Enjoy the private nicely landscaped yard with wrought iron fencing, many fruit trees & gorgeous flowers that bloom thru-out the year. This property is a gardener's delight! Plenty of off-street parking. You will be walking/biking distance to the Oakland Museum, the new A's stadium at Howard Terminal & the new waterfront shops and restaurants at Brooklyn Basin. This home is minutes from downtown Oakland, Chinatown, Jack London Square/Ferry Building, Lake Merritt Bart, Amtrak, major hospitals & downtown San Francisco is only 13 miles away.

Lot 114 - Our Plan 1 is one of our most popular floorplans. The kitchen comes equipped with a Bertazzoni appliance package and pantry for added storage. A rare find on a special street featuring an impressive juxtaposition of vintage charm + modern convenience. The fenced front yard leads to a cute front porch, spacious foyer, and living room featuring built-ins + a brick fireplace. The open floor plan continues into the dining area, through to the chef’s kitchen, all the way to French doors and enviable deck + backyard. The kitchen was fully remodeled with herringbone tile floors, quartz counters, wine fridge/coffee bar. All 3 bedrooms are roomy and both bathrooms have benefitted from recent upgrades. The easy flow of this home draws you to a deck that makes the space ideal for hosting get-togethers; indoors and out. The fenced backyard is a grassy oasis. Stepping stones lead the way to a garage with separate flex space and a sizable storage shed. Don’t miss this must-see home.

Ideally located in the Montclair hills, you will love spending time at home in this majestic Mediterranean home flooded with natural light and bursting with style. Overlooking Temescal Creek, this 4 bedroom 3 bath modern farmhouse style home features copious country charm all in a fantastic central location. Traditional design elements like exposed wood, vaulted ceilings, and charming built-ins have been lovingly enhanced by a series of stylish renovations, making this home just a dream. A large genteel front porch marks the entry, adding warmth to a white and black streamlined facade. A built-in bench and access to the attached garage to the right make the combination laundry/mud room extra convenient. Vaulted ceilings & glass french doors add grandeur in the living room, while a large hearth & fireplace grounds the space, providing plenty of coziness. Family room, office, newly redone primary suite, stylish open kitchen and dining, spacious bedrooms including one on the lower most level with separate entrance, beautiful garden with creek make this a home not to miss. Enjoy the charms of countrystyle living just moments from Montclair village.

This home offers sophistication on a peaceful cul de sac at the end of a little traveled road... Features include the wonderful flow from the sunlit living and dining rooms to the chef's kitchen with eat-at countertops, a huge primary bedroom suite enclosed in two full walls of glass, outdoor space on every level (garden at the entry, spacious decks on each of the lower floors), a wine storage room, a dumb waiter, 2-car garage, multi-zone heating/cooling, and other attributes you'd expect from a true luxury residence.

High ceilings, gleaming hardwood floors, and charming built-ins retain the character of the architectural style, while the modern kitchen and baths offer comfort and convenience. An easily accessible basement houses a laundry area and abundant storage space, and a long driveway provides off-street tandem parking. Conveniently located near Sausal Creek, Dimond Park and Lions Pool, the home is moments from Park Blvd restaurants and shops, Montclair, Farmer Joe’s Marketplace, and commuter access to BART and AC Transit bus lines.

The top floor has 2 beds & 2 full baths, and requires no stairs for access. Downstairs, with its own exterior access, has 1+ beds & 1 bath. Each floor has its own wood burning fireplace, laundry, & zoned heating. The house has a 2 car garage, solar system (owned), and tankless water heater. Zoom from the back deck for the best work environment ever!

A stunning Oakland Hills home perched above Montclair with spectacular views, and just steps away to the coveted Redwood Regional Park, Skyline Gate! This 5 bedroom and 4 bathroom mid-century modern style home with open concept kitchen has been upgraded and modernized. The large living room with gas fireplace is warm and welcoming, all complemented by vaulted ceilings, oak wood flooring and panoramic Bay, hills, and Mt. Tamalpais views. Stepping down on the floating stairs to the level below, you find a Master retreat remodeled with double sinks, jetted tub, separate stone shower and walk-in closet. This level has four more bedrooms, including one with separate entry for au pair or guests. Just below there is a huge great room with loads of natural light. There are multiple decks and outdoor spaces, each providing a more exquisite view than the last. On the final level you find a conditioned finished basement, ideal to be set up as a home office or workshop.

Absolutely stunning updated 3BR, 2.5 bath home sits high in the hills in a lovely Maxwell Park neighborhood. This light and bright Oakland gem loaded with character has a great open floor plan with expanded living space that offers opportunities galore. The lower level of this beautiful home is currently used as a spacious family room and in home office/ home gym/guest quarters, but could be for au pair, in-law or home day care with bonus kitchen. It even has a separate entrance. Updated kitchen and baths in 2013. Windows replaced in 2014. New furnace and master bedroom mini-split were added in 2016. This home has fresh interior paint, new carpeting and beautiful hardwood floors. There is amazing outdoor space with playhouse, fire pit area and gazebo for entertaining. The gorgeous front and back yards are a gardener's paradise. A must see!

Panoramic South Bay views beckon from every sun-drenched room in this updated mid-century 4BD/3.5BA home. Gorgeous oak floors and great light feature throughout. On the main level, are stunning picture windows, skylights, and a lovely patio with terraced garden. Enjoy open plan living with a remodeled kitchen, stylish updates include semi custom cabinets, bamboo shelving and quartzite countertops. There are 3 bedrooms and 2 baths on one floor, the primary en-suite bathroom has been renovated with tasteful marble and brass finishes and a double sink vanity. The closet is outfitted with an Elfa shelving system and mirrored doors. The family room downstairs is paired with a 4th bedroom and an updated en-suite bath (with exterior access!) perfect for guests or those needing some separation of space. When work beckons, step outside to a brand new Zoom room/studio. The down slope yard offers space for pets to run around, and you'll appreciate easy access via steps and pathway to the Village.

Welcome to the Penthouse! This exceptional corner unit is flooded with natural light and has a wide, open-concept layout. The bedroom has soaring 18-foot ceilings and a usable loft space above the closet. A bonus room near the entrance could be used as a second bedroom or the ultimate home office, complete with gigabit Internet. The chic, remodeled kitchen boasts recently upgraded appliances including an induction range. Other unique features include in-unit laundry, A/C, and two garage parking spots. The Sierra is a modern condominium located just a few blocks from the waterfront and offers premium amenities – a staffed two-story lobby, outdoor heated pool and sauna, state-of-the-art gym, open air lounge, and a cozy billiards / media room. Enjoy an easy commute with close proximity to BART, ferry to SF, shuttle through downtown Oakland, plus an endless array of trendy cafes, eateries and wineries nearby. Elevate your lifestyle and make this penthouse your luxurious new home!

Ideally located in the Montclair hills, you will love spending time at home in this majestic Mediterranean home flooded with natural light and bursting with style. A generously sized living room adorned with oversized windows and high ceilings allow the surrounding natural beauty of the area to become the backdrop of your everyday life. The open kitchen and dining room with terra cotta tile provide ample space to whip up your next culinary creation. Open the french doors off the dining area to create an indoor-outdoor flow perfect for entertaining in our gorgeous bay area weather. Up the staircase adorned with geometric wallpaper, you will find 3 spacious bedrooms each with its own unique character of nooks and built-ins. An updated emerald bathroom with marble and chrome finishes complete the interior. Out the back door, you'll find a private deck with stone fireplace where you'll relax and toast to the end of the day under the vibrant colors of sunset. Welcome home.

Wonderful opportunity to put those HGTV skills to work! You've seen those home improvement shows and said "I can do that!" Well, this one should be easy. Needs updating and a sophisticated decorators touch. The "canvas" and the basics are there. For a little inspiration, Unit 201, also 554 square feet, in this same building, showed very nicely and sold for $430,000 on 3/11/2021. Unit 101, also 554 square feet presents very nicely and as of 3/5/2021 is listed for $395,000. Do the math, I think that you will find it favorable. Great location close to Lake Merritt, library, museum, restaurants, culture and transportation.

Industrial chic, modern unit with a spacious floor plan and lofted ceilings. This gorgeous 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo features upgraded wood flooring, tons of natural light, and easy living. The bonus alcove would make the perfect home office, while the sizable private balcony invites you to sip your morning coffee or evening cocktail. Lots of usable storage can be found throughout the warm and stylish kitchen and generous closets. Other great highlights include in-unit washer/dryer, secure car and bike parking, storage, and package lockers. The massive rooftop deck offers ample seating for working or entertaining, plus a BBQ area with stunning panoramic views. Enjoy an easy commute with close proximity to BART, ferry to SF, shuttle through downtown Oakland, plus an endless array of hip cafes, eateries and wineries nearby.

Charming Upper Rockridge Traditional on the Sonia Street Alley. Warm and inviting, enter the front door to hardwood flooring, natural light and open spaces. The remodeled chefs kitchen leaves nothing to be desired and opens to the rear patio - perfect for indoor/outdoor entertaining. The family room with fireplace is the perfect ambiance for gathering with friends and family. Upstairs, 2 bedrooms and full bath include the primary suite. Downstairs, a guest suite with full bath can also be enjoyed as home office, gym and more. This spectacular location with level-in entry from the alley also allows for potential expansion. Location, light and comfortable style combine to make 131 Sonia Street the perfect place to call home.

Feast your eyes on this adorable craftsman cottage bursting w/charm & personality both inside & out! This 1bed/1.5bath home lives large w/its thoughtfully designed living spaces, open & easy floorplan, seamless indoor/outdoor flow, & bonus detached office studio providing the perfect retreat to accommodate today’s work-from-home needs. Shrouded by a lush blanket of flowering vines & variety of fruit bearing vegetation, the gardens provide both privacy & a delicious bountiful harvest all year round. Check out the private hot tub/spa hideaway with outdoor shower for that staycation experience. A one-of-a-kind private oasis with its lovingly nurtured gardens and personality-filled interiors located on a quiet, tree-lined street in Oakland’s Rockridge neighborhood just steps from College Ave shops, restaurants & cafés, top-rated Peralta Elementary School, neighborhood parks, groceries & daily life conveniences. Commuting to SF is a breeze w/Rockridge BART, bus lines & fwys just blks away!

Luxury, Park like setting condo at the Parkwoods. Features include, open kitchen/living room layout, fireplace in living room, and sustainable Eco friendly bamboo floors. Newly remodeled kitchen with gas range and new stainless steel refrigerator. In unit laundry and a private deck that can be accessible from both living room and bedroom so you can have dinner or just relax with a book! Amenities are wonderful! Community club house, gym, pool to swim laps and hot tub. Easy access to freeway to get to multiple cities and Transbay bus stop to S.F. Great location!

``Maxwell Sweetie'' // Get lost in love as you cozy on up in this adorable Mediterranean-style home. Freshly remodeled, you'll want to explore every corner of the 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom floor plan with your Sweetie. Enjoy low-maintenance front and back yard work together while you both brainstorm and discuss what the future of the permit-approved, detached ADU in the backyard may hold. You can't wait. From the Carrara marble kitchen backsplash to the new Redwood porch out back, Maxwell Park has never looked so good on you.

Fantastic modern condo in the heart of West Oakland. Boasting high ceilings and windows that run nearly floor-to-ceiling, this gorgeous split-level unit welcomes a flood of natural light. With an entrance to the unit on each level, the 1,440 square foot unit (approx. per public records) features an open floor plan. Outfitted with hardwood floors and granite countertops, stainless steel appliances – including a gas range – line the upstairs kitchen area. Downstairs, you’ll find your in-unit washer/dryer located in the spacious half-bath. The building features abundant outdoor patio space you can utilize to garden or entertain while the neighborhood features community gardens, an urban farm, and a thriving industrial art community down at American Steel Studios and the Crucible. Tons of storage plus one parking spot. Centrally located near BART, I-80, I-580, and CA-24. Come see why this incredible unit is exactly the kind of fresh start you need in 2021!

Vintage, modern 1939 bungalow on a spacious corner lot in popular, convenient Upper Laurel. Stoll up your corner walkway surrounded by a young redwood, front lawn, flower beds. Charming front porch opens to entry, living room, dining full of light & charm: curved plaster ceilings, tiled fireplace, niche, built-in shelves, corner picture window. Open arched dining room. Kitchen: Tiled wall over quartz counters, white cabinets, mini-pantry, s/s sink, appliances. Open archway to family room: built-in bar, wall of glass windows, French doors to fenced, level, full of sun backyard: brick patio, lawn, flower/veggie beds. Bedrooms: primary suite over family room: mini-deck, ensuite bath: marble floors, tiled shower over tub (glass doors), vanity sink. Via front hall: 2 bedrooms (cedar-floor closets), bath (marble tile, glass door & tiled shower over tub, linen closet with w/d. Garage under house, work benches. Near Hwys 13 & 580, Laurel/Dimond shopping, urban paths, walks, parks, hikes.

other_agents: Laura and Danielle Sell Homes Team - WINKLER REAL ESTATE GROUP
description: Do you want to live in the Bay area's most desirable neighborhood with breathtaking views? Look no further. This stunning mid-century modern with its large wall-to-wall paneled windows gives you spectacular views along with amazing natural lighting for the home. You can entertain your guests and enjoy intimate family dinners in the stylish kitchen. The home has an open floor plan that flows seamlessly out to the beautifully terraced backyard. If you need some peace and quiet to enjoy a book or need a nice private work from home space you can escape to your own mini office above the garden. Downstairs you will find the perfect playroom for your little ones to play or for your guests or in-laws to use while visiting. This beautiful home is close to all of the local favorite restaurants, has easy access to the freeway, and is close to the Rockridge BART station.

Delightful one bedroom unit has been nicely updated with newer kitchen, bath and carpeting. Perfect home for first time buyer or seniors with complete resort amenities. Complex has pool, tennis courts, bike storage (if space available), marina. Convenient to two BART stations, freeways, Amtrak and both San Francisco and Oakland airports. Level in unit includes one deeded parking spot and one deeded storage area. Walk to Farmers Market, movie theatre (when open again), lots of restaurants. Convenient to Chinatown. Lovely easy walk to Jack London Square. Located between Brooklyn Basin and Howard Terminal which is to be the potential site for the Oakland A's Stadium.

Rare 5bed/3bath home in Upper Rockridge. Gorgeous hardwood floors greet you as you enter. Elegant, sun filled living room with fireplace adjoins the spacious dining room. Eat-in kitchen with period details: rounded cabinets, shelves and breakfast nook. Two bedrooms can be found on the second level, both with hardwood floors and overlook the rear yard. Quaint, vintage bathroom is close-by. Primary suite is tucked away on the mezzanine level for plenty of privacy; enjoy peek-a-boo views and a sweet balcony. Flexible floor plan with two more bedrooms and bath upstairs. The separate entrance is ideal for a au-pair suite or can serve as home office, media room, guest room. Sunny yard with gazebo, fireplace and vegetable beds: plenty of space for the entire family to enjoy. Great storage and attached 2 car garage with interior access. Minutes to schools, College Ave shops/restaurants, BART and other transport options. Montclair Village also blocks away! https://tinyurl.com/y7m2fddo

Highly desirable location on the water with private boat dock. This is the unpolished gem that you have been searching for. 3 bedroom 1 & 1/2 bath with great views of the Oakland/Alameda Tidal Canal boating and its own private dock. Spacious living area. Garage has an attached office/boat room. Live in this fixer while converting to the home of your dreams. Highly desirable location on the water

Seller says Bring All Offers! Come see this unique 1906 Earthquake house in a historic Lake Merritt neighborhood. A quick stroll down the street gets you to Lake Merritt and the surrounding areas with many restaurants, shops and brings you in close proximity to downtown! This one bedroom with its period details, including wainscotting and coved ceilings, has received a full remodel. The house has newer perimeter foundation, Marvin double-paned windows, modern doors, skylight, mosaic bathroom with large shower, newly installed oak flooring, melamine kitchen and pantry cabinets. The private patio constructed out of maribu hardwood consists of a laundry/storage room with a new Energy Star washer, and lots of storage. BART is nearby. Great place for a person(s) tired of renting and looking for a low maintenance home to call their own. Many Custom Feature Throughout!

This bright and charming 1912 Oakland Craftsman was fully renovated just 5 years ago. Located on a quiet park block, this home has three bedrooms and large bath all on one level. The open concept kitchen features a stainless steel appliance suite, maple cabinets, granite counters, and bar seating. Honed hardwood veneer flooring and elegant crown molding help to make this home feel warm and sophisticated. The serene backyard retreat features an entertaining deck above a private lawn, raised vegetable beds, and citrus trees. The lower level's bonus/flex space is large enough for multiple uses including work from home space. This home is wired for AT&T Fiber. Your white picket fenced home awaits you!

Tuscany in Crocker Highlands!! Gorgeous one-of-a-kind home with dramatic living room featuring soaring ceilings and amazing full floor windows. Spacious primary bedroom suite with walk-in closet and deck. Additional 3BR and handsome family room with built-ins. Incredibly charming & private front patio/garden and huge back gardens. Lower level storage space offers huge potential. Attached to garage with interior access. All information and images should be independently reviewed and verified for accuracy.

Striking Mid-Century, Brilliant Natural Light and Serene Views all set in a Magical Tranquil Setting! Updated modern home that has a sought-after open floor plan, sleek living & dining area, statement fireplace and a large picture window that highlights the expansive views. Gleaming hardwood floors, exposed wood ceilings, and floor to ceiling white brick fireplace add to the warmth and texture of this home. Tastefully updated kitchen with wood cabinetry, granite counters, and high-end stainless appliances that include a Bertazzoni five burner range. Two generous bedrooms with exposed beamed ceilings, hardwood floors, and great closet systems. All level with seamless indoor-outdoor living adds to the magical setting of this contemporary home. Wonderful outdoor spaces with an expansive view filled deck, numerous patios, and landscaped gardens. Superb location within minutes of the Oakland Zoo and Chabot Regional Parks. Easy access to major freeways leading to the major Bay Area Cities.

address: 1909 San Pablo Ave Unit B, Oakland, CA 94612
description: This bright and spacious top-floor corner unit flat in the heart of Oakland’s vibrant Uptown features modern updates paired with enchanting Victorian-era architecture. Highlights include soaring 14-foot ceilings, hardwood floors, 10-foot windows, and classic details like custom millwork and 6-panel doors with fluted glass handles. The updated gourmet kitchen has granite countertops, stainless appliances, wood cabinetry, and a skylight. The kitchen is open to an expansive dining area with an elegant gas fireplace. The large living room is extended by a sunny 12-foot high bay window and has a second gas fireplace along with beautiful millwork. The generously sized bedroom is highlighted by ornate wainscoting and a cedar-lined closet. Limestone tile spans the bathroom and the foyer, which has a coat closet and a large loft storage area situated above. Incredible location surrounded by amazing dining and shopping. Only a quarter mile to BART, easy access to the bus/train/ferry/freeway.

Much Loved Vintage Bungalow in the popular Lower Rockridge / Temescal neighborhood. Move-in Condition. Freshly painted interior (2021). Upgraded electrical system (2021). New Lennox furnace (2021). New Deck (2021). New Range/Oven (2020). Hardwood floors throughout. Dual pane windows. Fireplace in Living Room. Charming Built-In Cabinets. Spacious eat-in kitchen. Easy maintenance backyard for garden / pets. Nearby trendy restaurants and shopping on Telegraph and College Avenues. Quick access to freeways. Short distances to Rockridge and MacArthur BART stations. Sunday Farmers' Market at the Claremont Avenue DMV. Lively and vibrant Oakland neighborhood! WALK score 91. BIKE score 95. One short block to AC Transit bus on Telegraph Avenue. Short commute to UC Berkeley. Virtual Tour via Matterport: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=1BehgkLCNQb&mls=1 /Offers - Thursday, April 8th, 3:00 P.M.

address: 5321 Miles Ave Unit Z, Oakland, CA 94618
description: 5321 Miles Ave Unit Z is a visionary, tranquil eco-modernist 2-story end unit, entered through a lush communal atrium+courtyard. Built in 1979, the project was designed by architects Lee Porter Butler & Williams Pearson as the 1st "multi-family housing project utilizing the thermal envelope concept.” Many bohemian 70's era modern design elements; exposed I-beams, thick plank wood siding, massive wood deck+balcony, panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows/sliding glass doors,& multiple skylights. Tastefully appointed w/ parquet wood floors, wool carpet on stairs, bamboo flooring upstairs, & artisan tiling in kitchen/bathrooms. Kitchen has a natural edge Redwood slab counter, wood cabinets, large pantry, deep steel basin, range oven, & fridge. Both bedrooms have verdant views & are ample size. Walk-in closets! Unique craft or zoom room off full bath. In-unit laundry rm! 1 car garage w/ storage/workbench. Incredible Rockridge location near Frog Park, BART,& College Ave! 89Walkscore/92Bikescore!

2 houses on 1 lot with separate PG&E meters. Property have much potential and it appears to have more living space than public record shows. Finished basement in front house with 3br 2ba. Rear bedroom has view of the Oakland. Rear house 1ba 1ba. 2 car detached garage. Near Mills College. Easy freeway access.

other_agents: David Juarez - Keller Williams San Francisco
description: Located in Oakland's Wentworth/Holland neighborhood, this income producing single family home with a large in-law apartment offers stable rents and steady cash flow. The main house offers 3BDs+Den, 1BA and an off-street parking spot. The lower unit has 3BDs+Den, 1BA. Both share a large, flat, sunny backyard. With opportunities for improvement and upside rent potential, this tenant occupied property is value priced to generate positive returns for a savvy investor. Located close to Fruitvale BART Station, International Blvd BRT and I580, tenants have easy access to downtown Oakland and the entire Bay Area. Fixer.

Sun-drenched 5945 Sherwood is the best of both worlds - a private sanctuary set minutes away from endless trails perfect for hiking/running/cycling, yet moments from Montclair Village amenities including restaurants, shops, cafes, and weekly farmer’s market. The home provides true indoor/outdoor living in both front and rear - the front garden features slate paths and terraced garden beds with 11 different kinds of fruit trees, and the rear features enormous room-sized decks which connect to nearly every room in the home, a chicken coop (with real egg laying chickens!), and 3 add'l types of fruit trees. Recently remodeled bathrooms, a remodeled kitchen, and refinished hardwood floors make this 1929 home feel much more 2021. Fabulous Lake Merritt and Bay views. Green improvements include owned solar panels, efficient windows and doors, and a 220v Tesla charger. Assigned to Thornhill Elementary based on location, though admission not guaranteed. 2 car detached carport for easy parking.

Exceptional 3 bed/2 bath home in a magical hillside setting located in the Oak Knoll neighborhood of Oakland. Stunning bay views will enchant you from the living room and bedrooms, and 86 steps will take you to the top of the yard for the most incredible views of the bay, plus direct gated access to the hiking trails in King Estates Open Space. Gorgeous updates include gourmet chef's kitchen with indoor/outdoor access, updated bathrooms with Carrera marble counters and tile, en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower + dual shower heads, attached 2-car garage with E/V hook up + interior access, drought-tolerant front garden + turf grass in back, dedicated electrical panel for future hot tub. Large patio with gate leading to garden beds and paved path to upper yard, where you will feel like you are on top of the world.

Welcome to 5421 Brookdale Ave, a classic California bungalow with a modern, artful twist. Bathed in light & updated throughout, this special home is located on a wonderful block in Maxwell Park. This 2-bedroom, 1 bath home has an open floor-plan & a comfortable indoor/outdoor flow. Both the kitchen & one bedroom open to the backyard oasis. Greet your neighbors from the front porch or enjoy gardening, play or relaxation in the enchanting edible backyard. Features include an updated kit w/ 5 burner gas range, extensive storage & quartz countertops, a formal din rm w/ original built-ins, a large living rm w/ a fireplace, a detached backyard studio, perfect as a home office or exercise rm, a glorious backyard w/ raised beds, fruit trees, drought tolerant landscaping, a patio, a spacious deck & a garden shed. Additional amenities include a newer foundation, updated electrical & many dual pane windows. Mills College & Maxwell Park are close by, as are Sequoia Diner, Communite' Table & more.

Built in 2009, this contemporary 3 story townhouse has a tremendous open feeling with abundant natural light. Features include bamboo & travertine flooring, and eye-catching metal stair railings. On the main 2nd level, you'll find a spacious kitchen including rich, stained cabinetry, granite counters with colorful tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, gas range and a built-in microwave. Both bedrooms reside on the 3rd floor, each with a private bath, with a floor to ceiling window and ceiling fan in the primary bedroom. The stylish primary bath has been recently renovated and includes upgraded cabinetry, lighted mirror and gorgeous glass tile accented shower. The owner has sectioned off part of the original attached two car tandem garage into a usable downstairs space just off the entry. Incredible commute location, just minutes to Bay Bridge access and BART.

The amazing views of the Bay, Downtown San Francisco, and the Golden Gate bridge are just the silver lining of this fabulous Maxwell Park home. Inviting open concept design on the main level, with a wood burning fireplace, custom built-ins and an attractive newly renovated kitchen with farmhouse sink, quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. On the upper level you will find the master bedroom with en-suite, an additional full bathroom, two more well sized bedrooms, one of which also has patio access to the verdant , freshly landscaped, tiered back yard. The large deck takes advantage of the fabulous view making it a perfect spot for entertaining. And to top it all off this home has a three car garage giving you ample parking and the option of creating your own home gym or workshop! Ideal location near the shopping and dining of the Laurel District, close to regional parks, trails, 580/13, Fruitvale BART station.

Wow! The opportunities are endless. Well maintained 2bd/2ba house with attention to detail. This gated property features secure, off street parking for 5-6 cars and automatic remote access. Extra large lot features level yards plus a deck. There is plenty of room for gardening plus a well built storage shed with 2 rooms, electricity and endless shelf space. A large updated kitchen features granite and all newer GE appliances. It opens to a laundry room with partial hill and city lights views. The front bedroom shares access to a Jack & Jill bath with dedicated heater, fan and dimmable lighting plus a jaccuzzi tub. The rear bedroom has a private bath, walk-in closet, second roomy closet plus dressing area. Recent int/ext paint and two new roofs.

Contemporary & stylish, solar powered townhome features 3 bed, 3.5 bath, 1,644 sq. ft. of open living space & a highly desirable floorplan that provides privacy & flexibility for modern living. The stunning chefs kitchen showcases an expansive island with quartz counter tops, handsome cabinetry, Bertazzoni & Bosch stainless steel appliances. The grand living room on the second floor featuring an open patio, makes this home perfect for entertaining & relaxing. Spacious first floor guest suite offers a large walk in closet & direct access to a private backyard. The master & junior suites on the top floor are both spacious & bright featuring ultra-luxurious bathrooms with double sinks. Modern & convenient amenities include keyless entrance, Nest thermostat, double pane windows, central AC, recessed lighting, LG washer & dryer in-unit, & attached 1 car garage with pre-plumbing for electric vehicle chargers. Community amenities include bocce ball court, ping pong tables, & picnic areas.

Remarkable Glen Highlands sanctuary offering inspired transitional style architecture, modern updates, hillside views, and close proximity to Montclair Village, Rockridge, and Elmwood for the upmost of convenience. (Rockridge and BART are at your reach in a mere six minutes!) Two floors of easy living, with the main floor at street level. The updated kitchen features stylish stone countertops, top of the line Thermador appliances, and an island perfect for gathering and entertaining. Soaring, open beam ceilings in the adjoining great room provide a light and airy feel. And you can cozy up during cold nights next to one of the home's three fireplaces. The primary bedroom is situated on the main floor and has its own en suite bathroom. A second full bath and office (or bedroom, you choose) occupy this floor. Downstairs you'll find more common living areas, as well as two additional bedrooms and a kitchenette that can support a multitude of uses, including au pair or in-law suite.

Overlooking the Sequoyah Heights community w/ stunning panoramic S.F. Bay views, this townhome is located in one of the most highly sought-after communities in Oakland, surrounded by hiking/biking trails, Sequoyah Golf Club, Chabot Regional & Knowland Park, The Equestrian Center & more! Nicely updated, this 3 beds, 2.5 baths townhome w/ 1,636 sq ft offers an open concept living style that is great for entertaining or relaxing while you soak in the serene location & sunset views. With street level entry, the main level features kitchen w/ breakfast bar, eat-in dining area, dining/living room area w/ gas burning fireplace, remodeled half bath, new vinyl flooring throughout, a rear yard patio, 2 car garage & laundry area. The upper-level features 3 bedrooms, 2 remodeled bathrooms, & a master bedroom ensuite w/ a vaulted ceiling that's engulfed in natural light & sweeping views. A well-maintained community clubhouse & heated pool is open year-round. A hidden gem & much to appreciate!

Industrial chic, modern unit with a spacious floor plan and lofted ceilings. This gorgeous 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo features upgraded wood flooring, tons of natural light, and easy living. The bonus alcove would make the perfect home office, while the sizable private balcony invites you to sip your morning coffee or evening cocktail. Lots of usable storage can be found throughout the warm and stylish kitchen and generous closets. Other great highlights include in-unit washer/dryer, secure car and bike parking, storage, and package lockers. The massive rooftop deck offers ample seating for working or entertaining, plus a BBQ area with stunning panoramic views. Enjoy an easy commute with close proximity to BART, ferry to SF, shuttle through downtown Oakland, plus an endless array of hip cafes, eateries and wineries nearby.

Tuscany in Crocker Highlands!! Gorgeous one-of-a-kind home with dramatic living room featuring soaring ceilings and amazing full floor windows. Spacious primary bedroom suite with walk-in closet and deck. Additional 3BR and handsome family room with built-ins. Incredibly charming & private front patio/garden and huge back gardens. Lower level storage space offers huge potential. Attached to garage with interior access. All information and images should be independently reviewed and verified for accuracy.

A sunny, extensively updated, turnkey home waits for you. This three-bedroom / two-bath home comes complete with a true chef’s kitchen (including a massive 6-burner stove & pro stainless vent hood plus stainless appliances, gleaming hardwood floors, & designer paint. All you’ll need to do is unpack! There’s a large, private rear patio off the dining room, perfect for al fresco parties under the strings of light. Choose to read or entertain in either the front living room or the rear den, each with a fireplace. The yard is extensively landscaped, including culinary herbs, many mature fruit trees, & dynamic flowering succulents. A 2-car attached garage leaves plenty of room for storage. Just blocks away from Redwood Regional Park, as well as a grocery store, Peet’s coffee and dining options, you can head a little farther to the Degrees Plato Taproom in the Laurel neighborhood. Both Hwy. 13 and I-580 get you anywhere else you need, or the Line 54 bus to the BART station is 2 blocks away.

Located on a private bluff in sought-after Broadway Terrace, 268 Taurus is a custom-built, Glen Jarvis-designed 4BD/5BA gorgeously landscaped Cape Cod beautifully conceived with spacious rooms and elegant finishes. No expense has been spared on the creation of a classic and comfortable oasis with exteriors inspired by the stately homes of New England and interiors that represent the best in California architecture and living. Thoughtful design integrity is reflected in hardwood floors and crown moldings, while vaulted ceilings, expansive windows, and multi-level balconies provide an exceptional indoor/outdoor flow with sweeping views of the SF city skyline and the Bay and Golden Gate Bridges. A fantastic detached structure houses a guest/au pair suite or brilliant home office with full bath above a two-car garage with abundant elevated storage spaces. The home is the best of both worlds, situated in the privacy of the hills, yet not far from the amenities of Montclair Village.

Totally re-imagined and refreshed Upper-Rockridge traditional with views of SF, the Bay, and the East Bay Hills! Gorgeous finishes, Viking appliances for the home chef, and fantastic indoor/outdoor flow. Enjoy California living at its best! Two primary suites grace this wonderful retreat, one complete with a fireplace for cozy nights! Come home to fabulous decks and lovely play spaces, all gated for children and furry friends! Zoned for Hillcrest Elementary (k-8). The lower level is primed for your imagination--zoom room? Office? Rumpus room? Ready to go!

Gorgeous & versatile 1920’s Craftsman 3/2 bungalow w/ huge detached bonus space! Whimsical charm w/ a beautiful stone fireplace in the living room & built-ins in the living & dining room. Spacious & bright w/ gleaming hardwood floors. This home has tons of updates along w/ well preserved period details. Enjoy a large well appointed kitchen w/ quartz counters, subway tile backsplash & tile floors. Plenty of cabinet space & room to work. The back bedroom has an en-suite updated bathroom & sliding glass door to the deck & yard. There are two more bedrooms & a second full updated bathroom in the hall along w/ a stackable washer/dryer & laundry sink. The home boasts lots of beneficial updates like tankless water heater, high efficiency furnace w AC, retrofit & partial foundation replacement, 200 Amp electric panel, copper piping/ pex, interior paint, sewer compliant. Small basement for extra storage. Close to the Laurel, Alameda, Downtown Oakland. Near transportation & 1.2 miles from BART

This charming home has stylish updates with three bedrooms and one bath. It also includes A BONUS BEDROOM AND BATH. It is set on a 1.7 acres of breathtaking land. Set back off the road and barely visible from the street. The single floor plan enhances the indoor/outdoor flow for entertaining both inside and out. A vast porch with incredible views on one side and a luxurious pool with an massive space to entertain on the other. In addition skylights help provide additional light.

Sunny and bright unit facing the courtyard. Located in Oakland Chinatown with lots of restaurants and easy access to public transportation. Farmer's Market on Fridays on 9th Street. Close to Jack London Square. Easy freeway access and public transportation.

WELCOME TO 26 EL PATIO. Own your little piece of this paradise just minutes away from Montclair Village with shops, dining, parks, hiking trails, farmers markets and top rated schools. Previously lived in by one family. Current owners completed this thoughtful restoration as their very own passion project. This summer cottage was originally built in 1939 and has been completely restored to its original charm with the added amenities of today’s modern comforts/luxuries. Lovely, front sitting porch that leads into the foyer. This property boasts a large eat-in kitchen, well thought out mud/utility room right off the kitchen. Large living room with a large picture window is framed by beautiful mature trees. Custom built in bookcase and cozy wood burning fireplace. Two large bedrooms with large closets. High end finishes throughout. Detached garage ideal space for possible ADU. Good size backyard perfect for entertaining. It's a must see!

Rare opportunity to own this sunny tranquil 4 bed 3 bath split-level Montclair retreat. Close to the village bustle yet tucked off the main st on a private road & surrounded by nature. This spacious, charming, & fully updated single family home includes updated kitchen & baths, solid hardwood flooring throughout, vaulted wood beam ceilings with skylights & 2 decks to soak in the surroundings. 3 beds & 2 baths on top floor with master suite & dual vanity sinks. In-law/private office with separate entrance on main floor in addition to the kitchen, living room & dining room with sliding doors out to the large deck & yard. Flat yard area is great to garden & entertain. Wood burning fireplace, 2 car garage with interior access & additional storage options make this house a complete package. Windows galore in every room with greenery spilling in from every vantage point allow this to be the perfect place for entertaining & California living!

Resting on an expansive lot, tucked behind tall hedges, 4339 Harbord Drive is a sprawling 4+BD/3.5BA Tudor in the coveted Upper Rockridge neighborhood. In the romantic Tudor style, the home features a charming brick face adorned by climbing vines, peaked front and side gables, and traditional half-timbering in the rear. The spacious modern interior includes a gracious entry, formal living room spilling onto the expansive rotunda, formal dining room, updated kitchen with breakfast bar and breakfast nook, and 3 bedrooms on one level - one a gracious owner’s suite. The home also features a private home office and two family rooms - one with a home theater system - and a guest/au pair suite with separate entrance. The dramatic rotunda deck and private multi-level back garden provide a tranquil retreat after a hectic day. Beautifully situated, the home is moments from Rockridge BART, coveted schools, and the Claremont Country Club.

Bright and chic starter home in highly sought after Grand Lake District. Located just a few blocks from Trader Joe's, Grand Lake Theatre and Lake Merritt. Recent upgrades include bamboo living room flooring and engineered wood bedroom flooring, new fixtures, and new paint. Home features an inviting open concept floor plan with breakfast bar and LOTS of counter and cabinet space. Walkscore 87, Bikescore 77. Commuter's delight with easy freeway access and nearby A/C Transit stop on Santa Clara.

Don’t miss this lifestyle estate with two houses on two beautiful acres! The main home w 3-beds, 4.5-baths (est. 5,136 sqft) has vaulted ceilings, expansive living areas, inspiring views and a stylish kitchen w a dining nook open to a family room. The primary bedroom suite has two full baths, two walk-in closets and a private study. The lower floor has rooms ideal for a home theatre, game rm or music studio, laundry, a full bath and access to the 3-car garage. (Elevator access on all levels) On the lower acre, across from the gazebo, sits a 2-bed/1.5bath home (est. 1202 sqft) w an open kitchen, dining area and living room leading to a sun-lit deck. There is a large space downstairs ideal for a workshop or art studio, and a 2-car garage w laundry. There is a fragrant rose garden, planting beds, and a rock garden w flowing waterfall. Other amenities: golf cart path over a bridge; fruit trees; 2-water storage irrigation tanks; solar, AC and two generators; and a private gated entrance.

Beautiful 3 bedroom 2.5 bath Townhouse with unobstructed views! Lower level consists 2 car garage with interior access, 2 bedrooms 1 bath and a patio. Upper level features a spacious Living room with firplace and deck, Dining room, all with views from every room! Kitchen, Master bedroom with fireplace. Carpet and hardwood flooring. Come and view your new home! Sewer & Sidewalk compliant.

Lovely Meadowbrook Traditional boasting 3 bedrooms/1.5 bath with an inviting front porch and the ideal layout for indoor/outdoor entertaining. Updated kitchen with granite countertops and new appliances situated between your cozy dining room complete with fireplace on one side and opening up to a spacious and private backyard on the other. All bedrooms found upstairs with newer carpet and dual pane windows throughout. Front bedroom with porch looking out onto the city and back attached bedroom perfect for home office, nursery, or potential epic walk-in closet. Newer composition shingled roof and fiber cement siding (apprx 1yr), foundation upgrades and seismically reinforced, and sewer lateral/sidewalk in compliance. Conveniently located to Lake Merritt, International Boulevard, vibrant Fruitvale district, and Hwy 580. Walk score 77!

Stylishly updated Montclair Traditional with clean lines and a hip, contemporary feel, nestled in a serene setting yet so convenient to Montclair Village and local schools! Great indoor/outdoor flow allowing your garden and backyard to feel as a part of your living space! Open living room with gas fireplace, rich hardwood floors, and an abundance of windows to enjoy the peaceful views.The well-appointed kitchen with all Miele appliances, stone counter tops and ingenious storage options opens onto the light-filled dining area, allowing you to stay connected with family and friends. The lower-level master bedroom is a true sanctuary to enjoy some much deserved quiet time or to pamper yourself in the gorgeous master bathroom with under cabinet heating and lighting, separate shower and luxurious tub overlooking the views! Outside, enjoy expansive decks, a flat yard and numerous quiet spots to enjoy reading, dining al-fresco or even an outdoor Zoom call!

Welcome home to this bright and sunny abode in the well desired Havenscourt neighborhood! Close to BART, shops, and more but situated quietly and quaintly. This bungalow needs a little TLC but has grand potential. Featuring 3 spacious bedrooms, bonus space, and a lovely dining/living room combo! The large backyard includes ton of possibilities holding a detached garage that one may think about converting! Don't miss out on this gem on 68th!

Live-Work-Play-Enjoy! A beautiful end unit GROVE LOFT at Pacific Cannery Lofts the Award Winning Rick Holliday-David Baker Gated community. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to enjoy all the advantages of living in this gated community. Newly painted throughout with ultra modern kitchen, newly painted cabinets and unique backsplash. Kitchen has all stainless appliances and NEW stove. Open concept Living Room Dining. LARGE private patio located on the lush tropical walkway to enjoy the fresh air and sunlight. Extra high volume Ceilings & Windows bring in tons of natural light. Upstairs loft style bedroom with huge closet and nook for a desk. Roomy bathroom with new cabinet. In-unit washer and dryer. Easy commute, Low HOA, Pets OK. Located just a stone's throw from San Francisco, Bart and freeways and bike paths. 1 assigned parking space with EV charger in gated garage with a secure bike room and dog washing station.

Welcome to this bright and beautiful contemporary condo in a lovely private setting! Features include high ceilings throughout and two-story configuration with cozy patio & yard areas. Spacious living/dining room with engineered hardwood floors opens to a gorgeous kitchen with new quartz countertops, large breakfast bar, new stainless steel appliances. Remodeled half bath on the first floor and 2 large bedrooms and a remodeled full bath on the second floor. Only 3 units in the complex, low HOA dues, gated & fenced with secure designated garage parking & storage area makes this a truly wonderful place to live. Great location, short walk to Ashby Bart, Farmer's market, Berkeley Bowl, cafes, and local eateries!
