description: Fresh and airy, this bright two-story home epitomizes uptown city living with style and comfort. Work from home in your downstairs living space, then jump upstairs for a change of pace: the two-story floor plan allows you to maximize your living areas with creative spaces to call your own. The kitchen offers a creative backsplash, playful colors, stainless steel appliances, a gas-range stove, and a nice new refrigerator to reinvigorate your kitchen skills, whether cooking for two, or hosting your closest friends. The primary bedroom is spacious with amazing light from the large picture windows. Soak in the gorgeous view of the San Francisco skyline with floor to ceiling windows, step onto the balcony and enjoy the fresh air. Located in the heart of Uptown, you will have access to Oakland's very best shopping, dining, wineries, breweries, and local flavor. Less than three blocks away from BART, Paramount Theatre, Lake Merritt and more.

Here's the house you've been waiting for - a delightful and private two-level bungalow surrounded by wonderful fruit trees and mature landscaping, is nestled within one of the Oakland’s great nooks, the "King Estates" neighborhood. The corner orientation provides this 2 bed, 1 bath, 1148 square foot home with ample light, which flows seamlessly inside-out, highlighted by a vaulted living room ceiling, a wood fireplace, hardwood floors throughout, and dining which opens to the lovely patio. Upstairs there is a walk-in closet and an extra room which could be used as an office or storage. A one-car garage and a level private back garden with towering landscaping provides you with ultimate privacy. Expansive area for outdoor entertaining, while also being fenced in to keep your pooch safe. Located near Mills College, and just a quick drive from public transportation, and Leona Canyon, with its miles of hiking trails. Just an 8 Minute drive to Montclair Village, with all its restaurants.

Fantastic opportunity for the first time home buyers. Ready to move in beautiful hardwood floors with new paint inside and out, nice lighting inside. Garage converted to an extra room, new carpet, new paint, done without permits. Private backyard for family gatherings. New roof, refrigerator and stove stays. Front yard has a rod iron fence. Priced right, won't last long. +++ VIRTUAL OPEN HOUSE SUN NOV 29 12:30 to 1:00 PM, go to FaceBook and enter @lynellbevels in the search box +++

Nestled on a serene Crocker Highlands cul-de-sac this English Tudor has been updated for contemporary living while retaining the charm and grandeur of its era. If you’ve been waiting for a special home that has a sought-after location, seamless indoor/outdoor living, an exceptional floor plan for everyday life and entertaining and expansive fully landscaped grounds, you found it! Guests are greeted in a gracious foyer with a grand living room bathed in light at the right. The adjoining dining room has French doors to a large terrace, perfect for family and friends to hang out under the stars. Equipped with professional level appliances including a Viking 4-burner gas range with griddle and 36” Bosch French door refrigerator, the updated kitchen is a chef’s dream. It opens to a family room. Upstairs are 4 bedrooms and 2 baths including a private primary suite. Downstairs is a second family room equipped with an entertainment center, full bath, workshop and wine cellar.

Overlooking Temescal Creek, this 4 bedroom 3 bath modern farmhouse style home features copious country charm all in a fantastic central location. Traditional design elements like exposed wood, vaulted ceilings, and charming built-ins have been lovingly enhanced by a series of stylish renovations, making this home just a dream. A large genteel front porch marks the entry, adding warmth to a white and black streamlined facade. A built-in bench and access to the attached garage to the right make the combination laundry/mud room extra convenient. Vaulted ceilings & glass french doors add grandeur in the living room, while a large hearth & fireplace grounds the space, providing plenty of coziness. Family room, office, newly redone primary suite, stylish open kitchen and dining, spacious bedrooms including one on the lower most level with separate entrance, beautiful garden with creek make this a home not to miss. Enjoy the charms of countrystyle living just moments from Montclair village.

Situated in the Crestmont neighborhood, this Mid-Century home offers sparkling views of San Francisco, the Golden Gate and Bay bridges, Mt Tamalpais & beyond. The open floor plan with great natural light, nicely updated kitchen & bathrooms, two-car garage with interior access, dual pane windows, air conditioning & recessed lighting are just some of the special features. Spacious covered deck provides a comfortable space for al fresco meals while the rear patio with fountain & raised garden bed are great for relaxing or growing your own vegetables. Three bedrooms & two baths including primary suite on upper level and an additional 4th bedroom suite below. This lower level makes a great additional primary suite or “in-law” with a large walk-in closet, sitting area with fireplace & both interior and exterior access. Great location close to miles of hiking & biking trails to renew your spirit. Convenient shopping on Redwood Rd as well as many shops & restaurants in nearby Montclair Village

Welcome to Adeline place. A highly sought after gated complex in the heart of Emeryville. Largest 1/1 unit in the complex with an office nook for work at home. Sharp unit, with high ceilings, open floor and abundant sunlight. Kitchen comes with granite countertops, designer backsplash, and under cabinet kitchen tasks light. All stainless steel appliances, inside washer, dryer (included in the sale). Making this home move in ready. Controlled access into the building along with FOB and directory. Lobby to be painted and new carpet in hallway. Well maintained complex, with a very proactive HOA. HOA covers gas, hot water, garbage exterior maintenance and hazard insurance. Walk score 88, just a short walk to many restaurants, shops, minutes from Bay Street and Market Place. Emery -Go-Round free shuttle, AC Transit bus to S.F., public transit, BART and easy freeway access, only 20 minutes to S.F. A must see!

Oakland / Piedmont border w/ DIRECT OPEN AIR ACCESS to this sheik mid mod condo. Almost 900 SF. Large 1 BR, 1 BA flat feels incredibly private. Fresh floors & refreshed kitchen / bath, along w/ all the elements you see & touch everyday, have been thoughtfully updated w/ designer look. New appliances, designer paint, light fixtures, countertops & tile backsplash, faucets, garbage disposal, Nest Thermostat, vanity cabinets, bathroom tile floor, carpet, dual pane windows, glass closet doors. Don’t miss the dining room adjacent to the kitchen and the wallpapered office alcove w/ storage & closet organizers! Every detail has been considered so you could move right in from day one. Perfect place for first-time homeowners looking to build equity or perhaps a local family who wants a nearby living arrangement for a relative. Rare 1 car garage w/ bonus storage locker, PLUS a 2nd tandem parking spot. Lovely shared garden & picnic/BBQ area shows pride of ownership. Don’t miss a RARE opportunity!

Just a few blocks to the shops, restaurants, cafes and the Saturday Farmers Market is this classic Crocker Highlands Craftsman bathed in natural light and loaded with charming period details. Updated for contemporary living with an open floorplan and fine finishes, this home offers seamless indoor/outdoor flow. The public rooms all open to each other with the large chef's kitchen at the rear featuring counter seating, a 36” Dacor six-burner range, French door refrigerator & quartz counters. Newer French doors open to the fully landscaped backyard with built-in grill, level lawn, terraced gardens and spacious patio, great for outdoor entertaining, play and dining under the stars. The primary bedroom retreat has a soaring ceiling, walk-in closet and sliding doors to a private terrace overlooking the rear gardens. 3 additional bedrooms, 2 baths, an office and tons of storage await you. A perfect spot to live, work, Zoom and play.

Become part of the Havenscourt neighborhood. Pride of ownership is evident in this well maintained home. New ROOF, New FLOORS, New Exterior PAINT, and TLC updates on the bones of this home offer a turn key opportunity sure to be desired. This charming and spacious (3) three bedroom and (2) two bathroom home has laundry, a secluded and spacious backyard as well as off street parking. The spacious backyard allows room for basketball, gardening or expansion of this move-in ready home. Around a 10 minute bike ride to BART centered between the 580 and 880 freeway for the commuters looking to call Havenscourt home. Located near the new Akoma Farmer's Market, with over 200 members in the neighborhood association you will find this community is thriving and growing.

Welcome to 9 Schooner Hill with one of the BEST views & backyards in Hiller Highlands! Spectacular, unobstructed views of the San Francisco & Oakland skylines to enjoy sparkling lights & breathtaking sunsets! End unit with 2 bedrooms, including a huge master suite with gas fireplace, PLUS a downstairs office/Zoom room, 2.5 baths, & LOTS of storage space. Elegant living room features high ceilings, crown molding, gas fireplace & opens to large balcony to enjoy the views! Gorgeous Armstrong wood flooring throughout. Kitchen completely remodeled in 2019 includes all new cabinets, crown molding, quartz counters, custom tile backsplash & new stainless steel appliances. Exceptional master suite has sitting area, fireplace, vaulted ceilings, large balcony, walk in closet & recently remodeled bath with quartz counters, dual sinks in addition to separate jetted spa tub & shower. Backyard with approximately 450 sq ft brick patio. Minutes to Rockridge and Elmwood shopping! Great commute location!

Welcome home to this mid-century modern 1960 home with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths located on an large lot. Located in the heart of the Montclair Hills. The living room features Oak wood random plank flooring and a floor to ceiling traditional brick fireplace. The kitchen is equipped with built-in appliances and lots of countertop and cabinet storage space. The kitchen cabinetry is cherry wood. The adjacent dining room is spacious with room to entertain and access to the large flat patio. The flooring in the kitchen and dining room is quality Amtico laminate. Hardwood floors throughout the home. The guest bath has a shower over tub, and the master bath has a big stall shower. Both bathrooms feature travertine tile. The home has a large patio accessible from sliding patio doors in the kitchen/dining areas and from the living room. The garden wraps around the entire property and includes many varietals of plants and flowers. Attached garage with interior access!

Delightful one bedroom unit has been nicely updated with newer kitchen, bath and carpeting. Perfect home for first time buyer or seniors with complete resort amenities. Complex has pool, tennis courts, bike storage (if space available), marina. Convenient to two BART stations, freeways, Amtrak and both San Francisco and Oakland airports. Level in unit includes one deeded parking spot and one deeded storage area. Walk to Farmers Market, movie theatre (when open again), lots of restaurants. Convenient to Chinatown. Lovely easy walk to Jack London Square. Located between Brooklyn Basin and Howard Terminal which is to be the potential site for the Oakland A's Stadium.

Well maintained Duplex with all separate utilities (gas, electrical and water). Remodeled down to the studs in 2017 with upgraded electrical, plumbing, mechanical and roofing. Sewer Lateral Compliant. Guaranteed monthly rents through Oakland Housing Authority with the tenants paying utilities (electric, gas and water). High density development potential in the RU-4 zone with room for expansion. Accessible to transit

Wonderful, spacious traditional home offering privacy galore from its corner location with ample parking and ez commute options. Enjoy level enclosed yard with patio and access from family room and stairs leading to lower level yard and upstairs to main floor entertainment area. Home offers 3 bedrooms 2 full baths with a roof garden off the main bedroom area to enjoy warm summer evenings beneath the stars. Great room floorplan with gourmet kitchen, refinished floors and windows framing treetop views. Interior access to 2-car garage and ample driveway parking. Ready for you. Pls contact Laurel for more information.

Welcome to 7211 Woodrow Drive, nestled in the beautiful Montclair. This gorgeous home will NOT last long!! Throughout the property you will find a ton of natural lighting, exceptional views, and expansive windows + skylights. Updates throughout the home include: A newly whitewashed brick fire place, new wood flooring in bedrooms, remodeled sink in entryway, plus more! A definite must see!! Totally re-imagined and refreshed Upper-Rockridge traditional with views of SF, the Bay, and the East Bay Hills! Gorgeous finishes, Viking appliances for the home chef, and fantastic indoor/outdoor flow. Enjoy California living at its best! Two primary suites grace this wonderful retreat, one complete with a fireplace for cozy nights! Come home to fabulous decks and lovely play spaces, all gated for children and furry friends! Zoned for Hillcrest Elementary (k-8). The lower level is primed for your imagination--zoom room? Office? Rumpus room? Ready to go!

Private and tucked away from the street, this beautiful 1946 built Spanish Revival nicknamed "Villa del Roble" is perched literally on the very peak of Oak Hill amongst the natural beauty of Sequoyah. Views rarely get better than this! From many vantage points in the expansive yard there are unfettered picturesque postcard views of downtown Oakland, the twinkling San Francisco skyline and Mount Tamalpais in the distance. Past the vaulted ceiling of the central grand living room is a wall of glass that opens to the impressive scenery and inviting heated pool. The impressive lot with mature oaks offers plenty of room for children to play, dogs to roam or perhaps an ADU. The downstairs suite has a separate entrance and opens to a flagstone patio, the pool and a neatly landscaped backyard. Located in rustic peaceful Sequoyah, your new home is close to Sequoyah Country Club, the Zoo and so much more. Let your vision run free and make "Villa de Roble" shine bright in your stewardship!

Fantastic Cul-de-sac bungalow in the sausal creek featuring 2Beds 1Bath plus a detached bonus room, fantastic kitchen with tons of light overlook the manicured backyard. Cozy living room with original and well maintained hardwood flooring and plenty of natural light. Book your in person appointment today.

2bed/1ba home in Maxwell Park. Large living room and dining room. Open floor plan. A lot of upgrades done in 2013 incl: kitchen, bath, electrical, roof & stucco work. Hardwood floor throughout. Washer/dryer inside. Large storage room in basement. 1 car garage & driveway. Beautiful front yard landscaped. Large flat backyard.

This lovely multi-level property is two blocks to Highland Hospital. The compelling living room has a beautifully architecturally peaked ceiling. There are three easily located bedrooms and access to the inspiring attic space above. Freshly upgraded kitchen with cozy dining area and adjoining is the larger dining room facing the expansive, sunny rear yard - the ideal opportunity for children's play, multi-use gardening, and outdoor dining. Street level has a wonderful, unique 2-3 car parking and storage area and adjoining space to convert to office use.

Newly renovated 3 bedroom and 2 bath home in the serene neighborhood of Oak Knoll Hills. Home features an open concept with plenty of natural light, spacious and modern kitchen, in unit laundry room, contemporary bathrooms, large bedrooms and new appliances. Second floor features a luxurious suite with its own private entrance and can be used as an office, second master bedroom, income producing Airbnb or explore the opportunities of converting suite into a rental. Escape to the outdoors by relaxing on the upper and lower decks with nature views or hanging out in the large back yard. Home is less than 5 minutes away from Oakland Zoo, a few minutes away from all major freeways and BART train and neighbors the amazing Oak Knoll Project (currently under construction) that plans to feature new parks, shopping and community center. Make this beautiful home in the dynamic Oak Knoll community yours today!

This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom corner unit is located in the desirable Cleveland Heights area. Freshly painted with newly installed carpet and high ceilings throughout, this spacious condo really shines. The living room boasts a cozy fireplace as well as a private balcony that provides plenty of natural light to both the living and dining areas. The kitchen has granite countertops and tile flooring. In the spacious master bedroom, you can easily fit a desk for a home office area, plus it has lots of closet space for storage. The second bedroom conveniently has a full bathroom directly adjacent to it. WalkScore® is 86 – enjoy convenient access to Lake Merritt's exercise paths, picnic spots with lovely vistas, popular neighborhood restaurants and shops, Trader Joe’s, Whole Food, Grand Lake Theatre, and the Grand Lake Farmers Market. AC Transit bus to S.F. is only a block away, BART and major freeways are a few minutes away.

Welcome home to your stunning 2 bedroom condo in the heart of the Longfellow neighborhood in North Oakland! This light and bright first floor unit boasts an updated kitchen and baths, in-unit laundry, and contemporary touches like updated light fixtures and an exposed brick wall. The unit is single level with a deck and shared yard off the master bedroom. As 1 of only 3 units, you'll enjoy tons of privacy while you relax (or work) at home. Take advantage of neighborhood gems like Arthur Mac's, Melana Cafe, Anders Olsen Farmstand, and States Coffee, or stroll to neighboring Temescal to enjoy everything it has to offer as well. This unit combines modern conveniences with sophisticated touches, and embodies urban living at its finest.

Rare opportunity to get into a condo that also offers a spacious yard in the heart of Bushrod on the Upper Telegraph border off Shattuck. Embracing it's mid-century heritage, the building has the appearance of a detached home. Through the charming entry gate a walkway to the front porch, w/2 steps, welcomes you into single-level living & offers beautiful hardwood flooring in the living room & both bedrooms, arched hallway entrance & even a pedestal sink & claw foot tub! Located in a residential neighborhood w/ conveniences to restaurants, parks & easy commute locations, the condo shares only one common wall with your neighbor & features an updated eat-in kitchen, recessed lighting, newer windows & bathroom updates. Gas range, refrigerator, full-sized washer & dryer in unit included. Plus there is a one-car detached garage! Have someone else looking to buy? Check out 610 61st Street which is also for sale. Panoramic views of the Bay Area, include the GG Bridge, Bay Bridge, the downtown SF skyline, & Sutro Tower. The living room features an exposed beam cathedral ceiling and views of SF. Immaculate new finishes! Steps from old Oakland’s vibrant retail and entertainment scene is 901 Jefferson, a beautifully appointed condominium community with 75 stylish residences, including lofts, one-, and two-bedroom homes. These sophisticated industrial residences feature curated amenities like a community co-working lounge, a secure parking garage, bicycle storage and a central courtyard with barbeque and conversational seating. Inside each home you’ll find quartz countertops, Bosch appliances, wide plank wood flooring and open floorplans with views of the city and local parks. Don’t miss this unique opportunity to own a modern home in a truly iconic neighborhood. 3% & 5% down loan programs available.

Exceptional 3 bed/2 bath home in a magical hillside setting located in the Oak Knoll neighborhood of Oakland. Stunning bay views will enchant you from the living room and bedrooms, and 86 steps will take you to the top of the yard for the most incredible views of the bay, plus direct gated access to the hiking trails in King Estates Open Space. Gorgeous updates include gourmet chef's kitchen with indoor/outdoor access, updated bathrooms with Carrera marble counters and tile, en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower + dual shower heads, attached 2-car garage with E/V hook up + interior access, drought-tolerant front garden + turf grass in back, dedicated electrical panel for future hot tub. Large patio with gate leading to garden beds and paved path to upper yard, where you will feel like you are on top of the world.

Must See! Gorgeous updated 4 bed/2 bath duplex on expansive lot w/ beautiful landscaped outdoor garden and patios. Nestled in the heart of Oakland's desired Glenview district. Open your kitchen door for seamless indoor/outdoor dining, entertaining, play & relaxation. Downstairs unit has 2bd/1ba, updated bathroom, refreshed kitchen w newer appliances, new countertops, tile flooring and subway backsplash. Sunlit front bedroom leads out to private patio. Sited on a quiet cul-de-sac in the Claremont Hills and offering unbelievable panoramic San Francisco Bay and Golden Gate Bridge views, 11 Drury Ln is a tranquil light filled home. Delightful easy floor plan, including open dining room and living room with soaring vaulted ceilings, chefs kitchen with granite countertops and Wolf appliances. Office/den on main level with built-ins. Three bedrooms and 3.5 baths including spacious primary bedroom with sliding glass doors to gardens. Third bedroom could be in-law unit, featuring it’s own living room and exterior access. Attached garage with interior access to main level. Au-pair space has it's own kitchenette! 11 Drury Lane is a peaceful retreat yet just minutes from College Ave, BART and UC Berkeley campus. A must see! City of Oakland, Berkeley mailing ONLY.

A true diamond of Cape cod style house featuring 4 bedrooms 2 baths, plus den or a Zoom office. Old charms of original crown molding, basement board. Hardwood floor through out. Upgraded kitchen with granite counter, tile floor. Extended back porch enclosed large backyard space. Separated storage shed has potential to convert ADU unit. Long driveway good for multiple cars.

description: Dubbed The New Albion house and located in an ideal Rockridge location, this elegant traditional ticks all the boxes. Moments from Rockridge park, Prospect steps, and the amenities of Rockridge yet the home is tucked just far enough up to enjoy hill and bay views. A lions head knocker greets you at the front door leading into a gracious entry space. Ahead lies the beautifully updated kitchen with a circular flow to a large rear courtyard, gracious living room, fireplace, and formal dining room. This charming home has stylish updates with three bedrooms and one bath. It also includes A BONUS BEDROOM AND BATH. It is set on a 1.7 acres of breathtaking land. Love an artistic home with charm, character and history? Look no further. Your dream home is a perfect mix of farm-to-table and custom design. Formerly the Oakland Concord Missionary Baptist Church, it was transformed into a family home blessed by the family who had been there for generations. The sellers repaired, redesigned, and reinvented with many creative details. The big backyard became the perfect spot for growing their own veggies, gathering fresh eggs and enjoying meals on the back deck. The Mom is a teacher, artist and chef, the Dad a renowned artist specializing in furniture, sculpture and home accessories. He redesigned their newly acquired home, transforming this historical residence to a beautifully integrated 3-bedroom, 1.5 bath home with all built-ins designed and made by him with quality of materials, craftsmanship and rustic charm.
